summary.span: 定义控件的基类，控件是带有可视化表示形式的组件。

span.span: Defines the base class for controls, which are components with visual representation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要创建你自己的控件类，从，类，或从其他 Windows 窗体提供的控件。To create your own control class, inherit from the , classes, or from the other Windows Forms provided controls. 有关创作自定义控件的详细信息，请参阅[开发自定义 Windows 窗体控件与.NET Framework](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/developing-custom-windows-forms-controls.md)。For more information about authoring custom controls, see [Developing Custom Windows Forms Controls with the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/developing-custom-windows-forms-controls.md). 类实现由向用户显示信息的类所需的最基本功能。The class implements very basic functionality required by classes that display information to the user. 它处理通过键盘和指针设备的用户输入。It handles user input through the keyboard and pointing devices. 它处理的消息路由和安全性。It handles message routing and security. 它定义控件边界的 （其位置和大小），尽管它未实现绘制。It defines the bounds of a control (its position and size), although it does not implement painting. 它提供的窗口句柄 (`hWnd`)。It provides a window handle (`hWnd`). Windows 窗体控件使用环境属性，因此子控件的外观接近其周围的环境。Windows Forms controls use ambient properties so child controls can appear like their surrounding environment. *环境属性*是控件的属性，如果未设置，从父控件检索。An *ambient property* is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 如果控件不具有，和未设置的属性、 控件尝试确定通过环境属性的值属性。If the control does not have a , and the property is not set, the control attempts to determine the value of the ambient property through the property. 如果控件不占位，如果站点不支持环境属性，或在未设置的属性，该控件使用其自己的默认值。If the control is not sited, if the site does not support ambient properties, or if the property is not set on the , the control uses its own default values. 通常情况下，环境属性均表示一个控件的特征如，即传递给子控件。Typically, an ambient property represents a characteristic of a control, such as , that is communicated to a child control. 例如，都不具有相同作为其父默认情况下。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 提供的环境属性类包括： ， ， ， ，和。Ambient properties provided by the class include: , , , , and . > [!NOTE] > 若要使 Windows 窗体应用程序支持视觉样式，请务必设置属性`System`并包含可执行文件清单。To make your Windows Forms application support visual styles, be sure to set the property to `System` and include a manifest with your executable. 清单是 XML 文件，包括作为应用程序可执行文件中的资源或者为单独的文件驻留在可执行文件所在的同一目录中。A manifest is an XML file that is included either as a resource within your application executable or as a separate file that resides in the same directory as the executable file. 有关清单的示例，请参阅示例部分枚举。For an example of a manifest, see the Example section of the enumeration. 有关使用视觉样式的详细信息，请参阅[视觉样式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/bb773187.aspx)。For more information about using visual styles, see [Visual Styles](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/bb773187.aspx). Windows 窗体具有辅助功能支持内置的并提供有关你的应用程序，使它能够使用辅助功能客户端应用程序，如屏幕放大器和查看器实用程序、 语音输入实用程序，屏幕键盘，信息替代输入的设备，以及键盘增强实用工具。Windows Forms has accessibility support built in, and provides information about your application that enables it to work with accessibility client applications such as screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities. 有时想要为辅助功能客户端应用程序提供附加信息。Sometimes you will want to provide additional information to accessibility client applications. 有两种方法来提供这些额外信息。There are two ways of providing this additional information. 你可以设置， ， ，和将报告给具有辅助功能客户端应用程序的属性值。You can set the , , , and property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications. 此方法通常用于提供有限的辅助功能信息的现有控件。This method is typically used to provide limited accessibility information for existing controls. 此外，你可以编写您自己的类派生自或类，提供所需任意数量的可访问性信息。Alternatively, you can write your own class deriving from the or classes, providing as much accessibility information as needed. > [!NOTE] > 若要维护更好的性能，不要在其构造函数中设置控件的大小。To maintain better performance, do not set the size of a control in its constructor. 首选的方法是重写属性。The preferred method is to override the property. > [!NOTE] > 不要在添加数据绑定其构造函数中。Do not add data bindings for a in its constructor. 这样会导致出现错误，生成代码，并可能导致意外的行为。Doing so will cause errors in code generation and can cause unwanted behavior. 中的控件的大部分命名空间将基础的 Windows 公共控件用作的基础上生成。The majority of the controls in the namespace use the underlying Windows common control as a base to build on. 有关 Windows 公共控件的详细信息，请参阅[常规控件参考](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/bb775497.aspx)。For more information about the Windows common controls, see [General Control Reference](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/bb775497.aspx). 若要标识 Windows 窗体控件从一个单独的进程，使用一种标准`SendMessage`调用即可传递 WM_GETCONTROLNAME 消息。To identify Windows Forms controls from a separate process, use a standard `SendMessage` call to pass the WM_GETCONTROLNAME message. WM_GETCONTROLNAME 是独立于语言和 Windows 层次结构。WM_GETCONTROLNAME is independent of the language and Windows hierarchy. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"建议解决方案的 Windows 窗体"主题[自动执行 Windows 窗体](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms996405.aspx)。For more information, see the "Recommended Solution for Windows Forms" topic in[Automating Windows Forms](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms996405.aspx). 使用属性的访问进行同步到控件从多个线程。Use the property to synchronize access to the control from multiple threads. 有关多线程 Windows 窗体控件的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 向 Windows 窗体控件进行线程安全的调用](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-make-thread-safe-calls-to-windows-forms-controls.md)For more information about multithreaded Windows Forms controls, see [How to: Make Thread-Safe Calls to Windows Forms Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-make-thread-safe-calls-to-windows-forms-controls.md)

threadsafe.span: 只有以下成员是线程安全： ， ， ， ，和如果已创建控件的句柄。

span.span: Only the following members are thread safe: , , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created.

threadsafe.span: 调用在后台线程上创建控件的句柄之前可能会导致跨线程调用的非法。

span.span: Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是在 Windows 窗体应用程序中使用的所有控件的基类。The class is the base class for all controls used in a Windows Forms application. 因为此类通常不用于创建类的实例，此构造函数通常不直接调用，但而由派生类调用。Because this class is not typically used to create an instance of the class, this constructor is typically not called directly but is instead called by a derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须调用方法为每个辅助功能客户端应用程序将接收的通知。You must call the method for each the accessibility client applications are to be notified of. 方法通常称为属性时设置或从事件处理程序。The method is typically called when a property is set or from within an event handler. 例如，你可能会调用方法并传入值`Hide`从内的事件处理程序事件。For example, you might call the method and pass in an value of `Hide` from within the event handler for the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个具有辅助功能的图表控件，并使用和类来公开可访问的信息。The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 该控件绘制图例以及两条曲线。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`类，该类派生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，在使用方法以提供为图表控件的自定义可访问的信息。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因为图表图例不是实际-基于控制，但改为绘制图表控件中，通过它不提供任何内置的可访问信息。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information. 因此，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`类重写方法以返回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示将图例的每个部分的访问信息。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 当辅助功能的应用程序使用此控件时，该控件可以提供所需的可访问信息。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此代码片段演示如何调用方法。This code excerpt demonstrates calling the method. 请参阅完整的代码示例的类概述。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要控制从此方法返回的实例，重写方法。To control the instance returned from this method, override the method. 如果当前没有给控件分配 ，则会创建后者的一个新实例。If no is currently assigned to the control, a new instance of one is created. > [!NOTE] > 要获取或设置属性，必须添加对引用`Accessibility`与安装程序集[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。To get or set the property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 有关辅助性对象的详细信息，请参阅[Active Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd373592.aspx)。For more information about accessible objects, see [Active Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd373592.aspx).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AccessibleDefaultActionDescription { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置控件的默认操作说明以供具有辅助功能的客户端应用程序使用。

span.span: Gets or sets the default action description of the control for use by accessibility client applications.

value.span: 控件的默认操作说明，供辅助功能客户端应用程序使用。

span.span: The default action description of the control for use by accessibility client applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象的属性描述对象的主要方法从用户的角度来看的操作。An object's property describes the object's primary method of manipulation from the user's viewpoint. 此属性应为一个谓词或谓词短语。This property should be a verb or a short verb phrase. > [!NOTE] > 并非所有对象都有默认操作，而某些对象可能都具有与相关的默认操作其属性，例如，下面的示例：Not all objects have default actions, and some objects might have a default action that is related to its property, such as in the following examples: - 选中的复选框，并且在"请先取消选中"默认操作的值为"已选中"。A selected check box has a default action of "Uncheck" and a value of "Checked." - 已清除的复选框还具有默认操作的"检查"和"未选中。"的值A cleared check box has a default action of "Check" and a value of "Unchecked." - 标记为"打印"按钮将"Press，"默认操作不具有任何值。A button labeled "Print" has a default action of "Press," with no value. - 标签或显示"打印机"的一个文本框控件没有默认操作，但是"打印机。"的值A label or a text box control that shows "Printer" has no default action, but would have a value of "Printer." 有关辅助性对象的属性的详细信息，请参阅[的描述性属性内容](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318025.aspx)。For more information about properties of accessible objects, see [Content of Descriptive Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318025.aspx).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AccessibleDescription { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置辅助功能客户端应用程序使用的控件说明。

span.span: Gets or sets the description of the control used by accessibility client applications.

value.span: 辅助功能客户端应用程序使用的控件说明。

span.span: The description of the control used by accessibility client applications.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象的属性提供有关对象的可视外观的文本说明。An object's property provides a textual description about an object's visual appearance. 描述主要用于提供更大的上下文对于视力较差或盲人用户，但还可用于上下文搜索或其他应用程序。The description is primarily used to provide greater context for low-vision or blind users, but can also be used for context searching or other applications. 说明不很明显，如果需要或多余基于对象的属性， ， ，和属性。The property is needed if the description is not obvious, or if it is redundant based on the object's , , , and properties. 例如，一个具有"确定"按钮将不需要的其他信息，但会显示的兰图片的按钮。For example, a button with "OK" would not need additional information, but a button that shows a picture of a cactus would. ，和(，也可能) 兰按钮的属性将描述其用途，但属性传达不太明确，例如"显示图片的兰的按钮。"的信息The , and (and perhaps ) properties for the cactus button would describe its purpose, but the property would convey information that is less tangible, such as "A button that shows a picture of a cactus." 有关辅助性对象的属性的详细信息，请参阅[的描述性属性内容](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318025.aspx)。For more information about properties of accessible objects, see [Content of Descriptive Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318025.aspx). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的实例派生类， `MyCheckBox`，将其分配到其属性，并设置和属性，因为属性是`null`。The following code example creates an instance of a derived class, `MyCheckBox`, assigns it an to its property and sets the and properties, because the property is `null`. 此示例要求你拥有名为`MyForm`。This example requires that you have a named `MyForm`. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用户将图像或图像文件拖动到窗体，并将其显示在上的点被删除。The following code example enables the user to drag an image or image file onto the form, and have it be displayed at the point on it is dropped. 方法被重写来重绘图像绘制窗体时每次; 否则该映像将只持续到下一步重新绘制。The method is overridden to repaint the image each time the form is painted; otherwise the image would only persist until the next repainting. 事件处理方法确定要拖动到窗体中数据的类型，并提供适当的反馈。The event-handling method determines the type of data being dragged into the form and provides the appropriate feedback. 事件处理方法在窗体上显示的图像，如果可以从数据创建。The event-handling method displays the image on the form, if an can be created from the data. 因为和值屏幕坐标，该示例使用方法来将它们转换成工作区坐标。Because the and values are screen coordinates, the example uses the method to convert them to client coordinates. summary.span: 获取或设置控件绑定到的容器的边缘并确定控件如何随其父级一起调整大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the edges of the container to which a control is bound and determines how a control is resized with its parent.

value.span: 值的按位组合。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values.

value.span: 默认值是 和 。

span.span: The default is and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来定义如何调整控件的自动调整其父控件的大小时。Use the property to define how a control is automatically resized as its parent control is resized. 锚定到其父控件的控件，可确保时调整父控件的锚定的边缘保留在父控件的同一位置相对于边缘。Anchoring a control to its parent control ensures that the anchored edges remain in the same position relative to the edges of the parent control when the parent control is resized. 您可以定位到其容器的一个或多个边缘的控件。You can anchor a control to one or more edges of its container. 例如，如果你有与其属性值设置为`Top`和`Bottom`、拉伸以维护边缘和下边缘之间的锚定的距离作为的增加。For example, if you have a with a whose property value is set to `Top` and `Bottom`, the is stretched to maintain the anchored distance to the top and bottom edges of the as the of the is increased. > [!NOTE] > 和属性是互相排斥。The and properties are mutually exclusive. 只有一个可以设置一次和最后一个组将优先。Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将添加到窗体并设置一些其通用的属性。The following code example adds a to a form and sets some of its common properties. 因此它会保留其相对位置，调整窗体的大小时，该示例将在窗体右下角该按钮定位。The example anchors the button to the bottom-right corner of the form so it keeps its relative position as the form is resized. 接下来，它将设置并调整其大小的按钮相同的大小为。Next it sets the and resizes the button to the same size as the . 然后，示例设置到`true`和设置属性。The example then sets the to `true` and sets the property. 最后，它将添加事件处理程序来处理该按钮的事件。Lastly, it adds an event handler to handle the event of the button. 此示例要求你拥有名为`imageList1`。This example requires that you have an named `imageList1`. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CPP/controlproperties.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CS/controlproperties.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/VB/controlproperties.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不支持透明的颜色，除非`SupportsTransparentBackColor`值设置为`true`。The property does not support transparent colors unless the `SupportsTransparentBackColor` value of is set to `true`. 属性是一个环境属性。The property is an ambient property. 环境属性是控件属性，如果未设置，从父控件检索。An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 例如，都不具有相同作为其父默认情况下。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 有关环境属性的详细信息，请参阅类或类概述。For more information about ambient properties, see the class or the class overview. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置和的默认系统颜色的控件。The following code example sets the and of the controls to the default system colors. 如果控件具有任何子控件，则代码以递归方式调用自身。The code recursively calls itself if the control has any child controls. 此代码示例要求你拥有与至少一个子控件; 但是，子容器控制，如或，与它自己的子控件将更好地演示递归。This code example requires that you have a with at least one child control; however, a child container control, like a or , with its own child control(s) would better demonstrate the recursion. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将引发此事件属性更改以编程方式或由用户交互。This event is raised if the property changes either programmatically or by user interaction. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后将其命名实例`Control1`并确保与事件处理程序事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#9)]

summary.span: 在创建控件的基础句柄所在线程上异步执行委托。

span.span: Executes a delegate asynchronously on the thread that the control's underlying handle was created on.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginInvoke(class System.Delegate method) cil managed
Public Function BeginInvoke (method As Delegate) As IAsyncResult

param.name: method
param.span: 对不带参数的方法的委托。

span.span: A delegate to a method that takes no parameters.

summary.span: 在创建控件的基础句柄所在线程上异步执行指定委托。

span.span: Executes the specified delegate asynchronously on the thread that the control's underlying handle was created on.

returns.span: 一个表示 操作的结果的 。

span.span: An that represents the result of the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以异步方式调用的委托，此方法将立即返回。The delegate is called asynchronously, and this method returns immediately. 你可以从任何线程，即使拥有控件的句柄的线程调用此方法。You can call this method from any thread, even the thread that owns the control's handle. 如果控件的句柄尚不存在，此方法搜索沿控件的父链中，直到它找到的控件或窗体具有窗口句柄。If the control's handle does not exist yet, this method searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that does have a window handle. 如果找不到任何合适的句柄，将引发异常。If no appropriate handle can be found, will throw an exception. 此委托方法中的异常被视为未，将发送到应用程序的未捕获的异常处理程序。Exceptions within the delegate method are considered untrapped and will be sent to the application's untrapped exception handler. 你可以调用如果必要，但这不是必需的委托，检索返回值。You can call to retrieve the return value from the delegate, if neccesary, but this is not required. 将阻止，直到可以检索返回值。 will block until the return value can be retrieved. > [!NOTE] > 在控件上的大多数方法可以仅从调用线程已创建该控件创建。Most methods on a control can only be called from the thread where the control was created. 除了属性，在控件上都是线程安全的四种方法： ， ， ，和如果已创建控件的句柄。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created. 调用在后台线程上创建控件的句柄之前可能会导致跨线程调用的非法。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 对于所有其他方法调用，你应使用 invoke 方法之一进行封送处理对控件的线程的调用。For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread. Invoke 方法始终调用控件的线程上其回调。The invoke methods always invoke their callbacks on the control's thread. > [!NOTE] > 如果应处理该消息的线程不再处于活动状态，则可能引发异常。An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示使用方法。The following code example demonstrates a use of the method. [!code-cpp[Control_BeginInvoke#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_BeginInvoke/CPP/control_begininvoke.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Control_BeginInvoke#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_BeginInvoke/CS/control_begininvoke.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Control_BeginInvoke#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_BeginInvoke/VB/control_begininvoke.vb#2)]

Invoke 方法始终调用控件的线程上其回调。The invoke methods always invoke their callbacks on the control's thread. > [!NOTE] > 如果应处理该消息的线程不再处于活动状态，则可能引发异常。An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示使用方法。The following code example demonstrates a use of the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件已捕获鼠标时，它指示光标在其边框内将接收鼠标输入。When a control has captured the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders. 在拖动操作期间通常仅捕获了鼠标。The mouse is typically only captured during drag operations. 只有前台窗口可以捕获鼠标。Only the foreground window can capture the mouse. 当后台窗口尝试这样做时，窗口只接收的消息时发生鼠标光标位于窗口的可见部分的鼠标事件。When a background window attempts to do so, the window receives messages only for mouse events that occur when the mouse cursor is within the visible portion of the window. 此外，即使前景窗口已捕获鼠标，用户仍可以单击另一个窗口，使其变为前台。Also, even if the foreground window has captured the mouse, the user can still click another window, bringing it to the foreground. 当捕获鼠标时，不应处理键盘快捷方式。When the mouse is captured, shortcut keys should not work. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性。The following code example demonstrates the property. 若要运行此示例，请粘贴下面的代码中一个窗体包含label1 和第二个名为控件名为 listbox1 和 listbox2。To run this example paste the following code in a form containing a named label1 and two controls named listbox1 and listbox2. 确保窗体和控件的事件是与此示例中的方法相关联。Ensure the form and controls' event is associated with the method in this example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`false`、和事件将被抑制。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. 属性值通常设置为`false`控件如帮助按钮。The property value is typically set to `false` for controls such as a Help button. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类并验证用户输入的电子邮件地址。The following code example uses the derived class and validates an email address that the user enters. 如果电子邮件地址不是标准的格式 (包含"@" and "。")，则验证将失败，图标会显示，并且取消了该事件。If the email address is not in the standard format (containing "@" and "."), the validation fails, an icon is displayed, and the event is canceled. 窗体上的按钮之一具有其属性设置为`false`。One of the buttons on the form has its property set to `false`. 单击或将焦点设置到此按钮不会触发验证。Clicking or setting focus to this button does not trigger validation. 此示例需要、控件，和一个已在窗体上创建。This example requires that a , an control, and a have been created on a form. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否捕获对错误线程的调用，这些调用在调试应用程序时访问控件的 属性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to catch calls on the wrong thread that access a control's property when an application is being debugged.

value.span: 如果捕获了对错误线程的调用，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if calls on the wrong thread are caught; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当创建控件的线程的线程尝试访问该控件的方法或属性之一时，它通常会导致不可预知的结果。When a thread other than the creating thread of a control tries to access one of that control's methods or properties, it often leads to unpredictable results. 通常，无效的线程活动是访问控件的对错误线程的调用属性。A common invalid thread activity is a call on the wrong thread that accesses the control's property. 设置到`true`来查找和在调试时更轻松地诊断此线程活动。Set to `true` to find and diagnose this thread activity more easily while debugging.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Click As EventHandler

summary.span: 在单击控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件传递给其事件处理程序中，因此它仅指示发生了单击操作。The event passes an to its event handler, so it only indicates that a click has occurred. 如果需要更具体的鼠标信息 （按钮、 单击、 鼠标轮旋转或位置的数），使用事件。If you need more specific mouse information (button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the event. 但是，如果单击引起操作不是鼠标，如按 ENTER 键操作，将不会引发事件。However, the event will not be raised if the click is caused by action other than that of the mouse, such as pressing the ENTER key. 由用户的操作系统的鼠标设置确定一次双击。A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system. 用户可以设置两次单击鼠标按钮之间的时间以便将这两次单击认为是双击而不是两次单击。The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click rather than two clicks. 每次双击控件时引发事件。The event is raised every time a control is double-clicked. 例如，如果你有事件处理程序和的事件、和双击窗体，这两种方法调用时将引发事件。For example, if you have event handlers for the and events of a , the and events are raised when the form is double-clicked and both methods are called. 如果双击控件时，控件不支持事件，事件，可能会引发两次。If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the event, the event might be raised twice. 必须设置`StandardClick`值到`true`会引发此事件。You must set the `StandardClick` value of to `true` for this event to be raised. > [!NOTE] > 不会引发以下事件类，除非没有至少一个中集合： ， ， ， ， ， ，和。The following events are not raised for the class unless there is at least one in the collection: , , , , , , and . 如果没有至少一个在集合中，以及用户与选项卡控件的标头进行交互 (其中名称显示)，则引发相应的事件。If there is at least one in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the names appear), the raises the appropriate event. 但是，如果用户交互的选项卡页中，客户端区域内引发相应的事件。However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the raises the appropriate event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示事件处理程序中的事件。The following code example shows the event in an event handler. public: property System::Drawing::Rectangle ClientRectangle { System::Drawing::Rectangle get(); };

summary.span: 获取表示控件的工作区的矩形。

span.span: Gets the rectangle that represents the client area of the control.

value.span: ，它表示控件的工作区。

span.span: A that represents the client area of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的客户端区域是该控件，减去如滚动条、 边框、 标题栏和菜单非工作区元素的边界。The client area of a control is the bounds of the control, minus the nonclient elements such as scroll bars, borders, title bars, and menus. 由于客户端坐标相对于控件的客户端区域的左上角，此属性返回的矩形的左上角的坐标为 (0，0)。Because client coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of the client area of the control, the coordinates of the upper-left corner of the rectangle returned by this property are (0,0). 此属性可用于获取的大小和任务，例如在控件的图面上绘制的控件的客户端区域的坐标。You can use this property to obtain the size and coordinates of the client area of the control for tasks such as drawing on the surface of the control. 在控件上绘制的详细信息，请参阅[呈现 Windows 窗体控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-a-windows-forms-control.md)。For more information about drawing on controls, see [Rendering a Windows Forms Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-a-windows-forms-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例启用窗体的自动滚动，调整窗体，并确保按钮在窗体调整后仍然保持可见。The following code example enables auto-scrolling for a form, resizes the form, and ensures that a button remains visible after the form is resized. 此示例要求你拥有与名为`button2`在其上。This example requires that you have a with a named `button2` on it. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/CPP/controlmembers5.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/CS/controlmembers5.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/VB/controlmembers5.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Size ClientSize { System::Drawing::Size get(); void set(System::Drawing::Size value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置控件的工作区的高度和宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height and width of the client area of the control.

value.span: ，表示控件的工作区的维数。

span.span: A that represents the dimensions of the client area of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的客户端区域是该控件，减去如滚动条、 边框、 标题栏和菜单非工作区元素的边界。The client area of a control is the bounds of the control, minus the nonclient elements such as scroll bars, borders, title bars, and menus. 方法调用来设置属性。The method is called to set the property. 属性始终不更改通过其`set`方法，以便应重写方法，以确保你的代码执行时属性设置。The property is not always changed through its `set` method so you should override the method to ensure that your code is executed when the property is set. 和属性表示的宽度和高度的控件的工作区。The and properties represent the width and height of the client area of the control. 可以使用此属性以获取有关任务，例如在控件的图面上绘制控件的客户端区域的大小。You can use this property to obtain the size of the client area of the control for tasks such as drawing on the surface of the control. 在控件上绘制的详细信息，请参阅[呈现 Windows 窗体控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-a-windows-forms-control.md)。For more information about drawing on controls, see [Rendering a Windows Forms Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-a-windows-forms-control.md). > [!NOTE] > 无法将应用程序设置绑定到此属性。You cannot bind application settings to this property. 应用程序设置的详细信息，请参阅[应用程序设置概述](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-overview.md)。For more information on application settings, see [Application Settings Overview](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例调整大小时指定的控件，因此该控件能够容纳带格式的文本。The following code example resizes the specified control so the control will accommodate its formatted text. 格式化的文本是与该控件的属性的分配应用于文本。The formatted text is the property with the control's assigned applied to the text. `AutoSizeControl`在此示例中的方法还具有`textPadding`表示要应用于控件的所有边缘的填充的参数。The `AutoSizeControl` method in this example also has a `textPadding` parameter that represents the padding to apply to all edges of the control. 若要使边距相等，请将与文本对齐值，如果控件支持它。To make the padding appear equal, align the text with the value, if your control supports it. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/CPP/controlmembers5.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/CS/controlmembers5.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/VB/controlmembers5.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取包含在控件内的控件的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of controls contained within the control.

value.span: ，它表示控件内包含的控件的集合。

span.span: A representing the collection of controls contained within the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可以充当控件的集合的父级。A can act as a parent to a collection of controls. 例如，当多个控件添加到，每个控件为属于分配给派生自该窗体的属性类。For example, when several controls are added to a , each of the controls is a member of the assigned to the property of the form, which is derived from the class. 你可以操作中的控件分配给通过使用提供的方法的属性类。You can manipulate the controls in the assigned to the property by using the methods available in the class. 在多个控件添加到父控件时，建议您调用方法之前初始化要添加的控件。When adding several controls to a parent control, it is recommended that you call the method before initializing the controls to be added. 在将控件添加到父控件之后, 调用方法。After adding the controls to the parent control, call the method. 这样会增加有许多控件的应用程序的性能。Doing so will increase the performance of applications with many controls. 使用属性来循环访问所有控件的窗体中，包括嵌套的控件。Use the property to iterate through all controls of a form, including nested controls. 使用方法来检索上一页或下一页子控件的 tab 键顺序。Use the method to retrieve the previous or next child control in the tab order. 使用属性来获取或设置容器控件的活动控件。Use the property to get or set the active control of a container control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例中删除从派生的类的如果它是集合的成员。The following code example removes a from the of the derived class if it is a member of the collection. 该示例需要你已创建了、 ，且至少一个控制上。The example requires that you have created a , a , and at least one control on a . 控件添加到控件，与控件添加到。The control(s) are added to the control, and the control added to the . 单选按钮时单击该按钮，名为`removeButton`从删除。When the button is clicked, the radio button named `removeButton` is removed from the . [!code-cpp[ControlCollection#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CPP/controlcollection.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[ControlCollection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CS/controlcollection.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ControlCollection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/VB/controlcollection.vb#4)]

Protected Overridable Function CreateAccessibilityInstance () As AccessibleObject

summary.span: 为该控件创建一个新的辅助功能对象。

span.span: Creates a new accessibility object for the control.

returns.span: 控件的新 。

span.span: A new for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不显式调用 方法，则在引用 属性时将会调用此方法。If you do not explicitly call the method, it will be called when the property is referenced. > [!NOTE] > 要获取或设置属性，必须添加对引用`Accessibility`与安装程序集[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。To get or set the property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个具有辅助功能的图表控件，并使用和类来公开可访问的信息。The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 该控件绘制图例以及两条曲线。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`类，该类派生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，在使用方法以提供为图表控件的自定义可访问的信息。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因为图表图例不是实际-基于控制，但改为绘制图表控件中，通过它不提供任何内置的可访问信息。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information. 因此，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`类重写方法以返回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示将图例的每个部分的访问信息。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 当辅助功能的应用程序使用此控件时，该控件可以提供所需的可访问信息。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此代码片段演示如何重写方法。This code excerpt demonstrates overriding the method. 请参阅完整的代码示例的类概述。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#2)]

summary.span: 强制创建可见控件，包括创建句柄和任何可见子控件。

span.span: Forces the creation of the visible control, including the creation of the handle and any visible child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法强制要创建的控件及其子控件的句柄。The method forces a handle to be created for the control and its child controls. 当需要一个句柄立即进行操作的控件或其子项; 使用此方法只需调用控件的构造函数不会创建。This method is used when you need a handle immediately for manipulation of the control or its children; simply calling a control's constructor does not create the . 不会创建控件句柄，如果控件的属性是`false`。 does not create a control handle if the control's property is `false`. 可以通过调用方法或访问要创建控件的属性处理而不考虑控件的可见性，但在此情况下，为控件的子级创建句柄没有窗口。You can either call the method or access the property to create the control's handle regardless of the control's visibility, but in this case, no window handles are created for the control's children.

summary.span: 为控件创建 。

span.span: Creates the for the control.

returns.span: 控件的 。

span.span: The for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 检索到的对象方法应不通常会保留后当前的 Windows 消息已处理，因为与该对象的任何内容将被删除下, 一步 WM_PAINT 消息。The object that you retrieve through the method should not normally be retained after the current Windows message has been processed, because anything painted with that object will be erased with the next WM_PAINT message. 因此无法缓存对象以重用，除非若要使用非可视方法，如。Therefore you cannot cache the object for reuse, except to use non-visual methods like . 相反，您必须调用你想要使用每次对象，，然后调用在完成使用它时。Instead, you must call every time that you want to use the object, and then call when you are finished using it. 有关 Windows 消息的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about Windows messages, see . 按照设计，将所有权设置为调用线程，并且如果在其他线程上调用将失败。By design, sets ownership to the calling thread, and fails if it is called on other threads. > [!NOTE] > 除了属性，在控件上都是线程安全的四种方法： ， ， ，和如果已创建控件的句柄。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created. 调用在后台线程上创建控件的句柄之前可能会导致跨线程调用的非法。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 对于所有其他方法调用，你应使用 invoke 方法之一进行封送处理对控件的线程的调用。For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread. ## Examples 下面的代码示例调整大小时指定的控件，因此该控件能够容纳带格式的文本。The following code example resizes the specified control so the control will accommodate its formatted text. 格式化的文本是与该控件的属性的分配应用于文本。The formatted text is the property with the control's assigned applied to the text. `AutoSizeControl`在此示例中的方法还具有`textPadding`表示要应用于控件的所有边缘的填充的参数。The `AutoSizeControl` method in this example also has a `textPadding` parameter that represents the padding to apply to all edges of the control. 若要使边距相等，请将与文本对齐`MiddleCenter`值如果控件支持它。To make the padding appear equal, align the text with the `MiddleCenter` value of if your control supports it. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/CPP/controlmembers5.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/CS/controlmembers5.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/VB/controlmembers5.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分配到要更改鼠标指针位于控件上方时显示的光标的控件的属性。Assign a to the property of the control to change the cursor displayed when the mouse pointer is over the control. 若要暂时更改你的应用程序集上的所有控件的鼠标光标属性。To temporarily change the mouse cursor for all controls on your application set the property. 通常将设置属性填充时等待光标或保存或加载文件。Typically you would set the property to a wait cursor when populating a or saving or loading a file. 属性是一个环境属性。The property is an ambient property. 环境属性是控件属性，如果未设置，从父控件检索。An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 例如，都不具有相同作为其父默认情况下。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 有关环境属性的详细信息，请参阅类或类概述。For more information about ambient properties, see the class or the class overview. ## Examples 以下代码示例填充以用户的可用逻辑驱动器。The following code example fills a with the user's available logical drives. 该示例还将组合框属性因此鼠标指针位于下拉按钮时显示的光标。The example also sets the combo box's property so the cursor is displayed when the mouse pointer is over the drop-down button. 此代码，你需要具有与在其上。This code requires that you have a with a on it. summary.span: 释放由 和它的子控件占用的非托管资源，另外还可以释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and its child controls and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。`Dispose()`This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method.`Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

public: property bool Disposing { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 基类是否在释放进程中。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the base class is in the process of disposing.

value.span: 如果 基类在释放进程中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the base class is in the process of disposing; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性返回`true`，基类是在释放进程中。When this property returns `true`, the base class is in the process of disposing. 控件释放后，不再有效的 Windows 控件作为引用。After the control is disposed of, it can no longer be referenced as a valid Windows control. 即使控件的实例已释放，它仍保留在内存中直到从通过垃圾回收的内存中删除。Even though the instance of a control is disposed of, it is still maintained in memory until it is removed from memory through garbage collection. 当控件被释放的时不能调用其方法。When a control is disposed of, you cannot call its method.

summary.span: 获取或设置哪些控件边框停靠到其父控件并确定控件如何随其父级一起调整大小。

span.span: Gets or sets which control borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a control is resized with its parent.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来定义如何调整控件的自动调整其父控件的大小时。Use the property to define how a control is automatically resized as its parent control is resized. 例如，设置到导致的控件将其自身的其父控件的左边缘对齐，并根据父控件一起调整大小调整大小。For example, setting to causes the control to align itself with the left edges of its parent control and to resize as the parent control is resized. 控件停靠在其 Z 顺序，即沿窗体的 z 轴 （深度） 窗体上控件的可视化分层。Controls are docked in their Z-order, which is the visual layering of controls on a form along the form's Z-axis (depth). 控件可以停靠到其父容器的一个边或可以停靠到所有边缘和填充的父容器。A control can be docked to one edge of its parent container or can be docked to all edges and fill the parent container. 设置停靠控件上的属性不起该控件从其容器的边缘的距离。Setting the property on a docked control has no effect on the distance of the control from the edges of its container. > [!NOTE] > 和属性是互相排斥。The and properties are mutually exclusive. 只有一个可以设置一次和最后一个组将优先。Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并设置一些其通用的属性。The following code example creates a and sets some of its common properties. 该示例创建并设置其组框中。The example creates a and sets its within the group box. 接下来，它将设置属性组框中，并停靠组框中的，到窗体顶部。Next, it sets the property of the group box, and docks the group box to the top of the form. 最后，通过设置禁用分组框属性`false`，这将导致产生包含在要禁用的组框内的所有控件。Lastly, it disables the group box by setting the property to `false`, which causes all controls contained within the group box to be disabled. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CPP/controlproperties.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CS/controlproperties.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/VB/controlproperties.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将引发此事件通过以编程方式修改或用户交互更改属性。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个事件处理程序时执行属性值更改。The following code example is an event handler that is executed when the property value changes. 类的一些方法的名称模式具有*PropertyName* `Changed`都时引发相应*PropertyName*值发生更改 (*PropertyName*表示对应的属性的名称)。The class has several methods with the name pattern *PropertyName*`Changed` that are raised when the corresponding *PropertyName* value changes(*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下面的代码示例更改的显示货币数据。The following code example changes the of a displaying currency data. 该示例将文本转换为十进制数和更改到如果数字为负和如果数值为正。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 此示例要求你拥有包含。This example requires that you have a that contains a . summary.span: 开始拖放操作。

span.span: Begins a drag-and-drop operation.

returns.span: 枚举的值，它表示在拖放操作期间执行的最终效果。

span.span: A value from the enumeration that represents the final effect that was performed during the drag-and-drop operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `allowedEffects`参数确定哪些拖动操作可以发生。The `allowedEffects` parameter determines which drag operations can occur. 如果在拖动操作需要与另一个进程中的应用程序进行互操作，数据应为基的托管的类 (， ，或)，或实现的对象或。If the drag operation needs to interoperate with applications in another process, data should either be a base managed class (, , or ), or an object that implements or . 下面描述与拖放操作相关的事件的引发方式以及引发时间。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 方法确定当前光标位置下的控件。The method determines the control under the current cursor location. 然后检查以确定控件是否有效的放置目标。It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target. 如果控件是有效的放置目标，产生指定的拖放效果引发事件。If the control is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 有关拖放效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 跟踪鼠标光标位置、键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态的更改。Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果用户移出一个窗口，则引发 事件。If the user moves out of a window, the event is raised. - 如果鼠标进入另一个控件，则引发该控件的 。If the mouse enters another control, the for that control is raised. - 如果鼠标移动但停留在同一个控件中，则引发 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the event is raised. 如果键盘或鼠标按钮状态，更改事件引发，并确定是否继续拖动、 放置数据或取消该操作基于值属性的事件的。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the property of the event's . - 如果值是`Continue`、引发事件以继续操作和产生新效果引发事件，从而能够设置适当的视觉反馈。If the value of is `Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和事件成对发生，以便当鼠标移到放置目标时，用户提供的最新反馈有关鼠标位置。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position. - 如果值是`Drop`、 向源返回放置效果值，以便源应用程序可以执行适当的操作的源数据; 例如，如果会剪切数据是移动操作。If the value of is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. - 如果值是`Cancel`、引发事件。If the value of is `Cancel`, the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 方法捕获所有异常，并重新引发的以下安全或严重异常：The method catches all exceptions and rethrows only the following security or critical exceptions: - SecurityExceptionSecurityException - NullReferenceExceptionNullReferenceException - StackOverflowExceptionStackOverflowException - OutOfMemoryExceptionOutOfMemoryException - ThreadAbortExceptionThreadAbortException - ExecutionEngineExceptionExecutionEngineException - IndexOutOfRangeExceptionIndexOutOfRangeException - AccessViolationExceptionAccessViolationException ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示两个之间拖放操作控件。The following code example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 该示例通过调用方法的拖放操作启动时。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果鼠标已移动的拖放操作启动多个从期间的鼠标位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定要在将拖动的项的索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 该示例还演示如何使用自定义光标拖放操作。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例需要两个光标文件`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`、 存在于应用程序目录，用于自定义拖动和非放置光标，分别。The example requires that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果将使用自定义光标`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已选中。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自定义光标设置事件处理程序。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态评估中事件处理程序右侧`ListBox`，以确定将哪些拖动操作基于 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 和 CTRL + ALT 键的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based on state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期间还确定将发生放置`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是`String`，则设置为`None`中。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to `None` in . 最后，下拉的状态将显示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel` . 要为权限放置的数据`ListBox`中确定事件处理程序和`String`值添加中的适当位置`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果在拖动操作超出边界的窗体中，则采用取消拖放操作事件处理程序。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用枚举来指定应如何将数据转移之间拖放操作中涉及的控件。The following code example shows how to use the enumeration to specify how data should be transferred between the controls involved in a drag-and-drop operation. 此示例需要你的窗体包括控件和控制的和控件中填充有效的文件名称的列表。This example requires that your form includes a control and a control and that the control is populated with a list of valid file names. 当用户拖动文件名拖到控件，该控件的引发事件。When the user drags a file name onto the control, the control's event is raised. 在事件处理程序，属性初始化为以指示所引用的文件路径的数据应复制到控件。Within the event handler, the property of the is initialized to to indicate that the data referenced by the file path should be copied to the control. [!code-cpp[RichTextDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RichTextDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RichTextDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此控件是否应使用辅助缓冲区重绘其图面，以减少或避免闪烁。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this control should redraw its surface using a secondary buffer to reduce or prevent flicker.

value.span: 如果应使用双缓冲绘制控件的图面，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the surface of the control should be drawn using double buffering; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓冲的图形可以减少或消除引起的部件的显示的图面渐进式重绘的闪烁。Buffered graphics can reduce or eliminate flicker that is caused by progressive redrawing of parts of a displayed surface. 缓冲的图形需要更新的图形数据首先写入缓冲区。Buffered graphics require that the updated graphics data is first written to a buffer. 图形缓冲区中的数据快速然后写入到显示的图面内存中。The data in the graphics buffer is then quickly written to displayed surface memory. 显示的图形内存相对快速交换机通常会减少可以出现闪烁。The relatively quick switch of the displayed graphics memory typically reduces the flicker that can otherwise occur. > [!NOTE] > 不是可绑定属性。 is not a bindable property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DoubleClick As EventHandler

summary.span: 在双击控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control is double-clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由用户的操作系统的鼠标设置确定一次双击。A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system. 用户可以设置两次单击鼠标按钮之间的时间以便将这两次单击认为是双击而不是两次单击。The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click rather than two clicks. 每次双击控件时引发事件。The event is raised every time a control is double-clicked. 例如，如果你有事件处理程序和的事件、和双击窗体，这两种方法调用时将引发事件。For example, if you have event handlers for the and events of a , the and events are raised when the form is double-clicked and both methods are called. 如果双击控件时，控件不支持事件，事件，可能会引发两次。If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the event, the event might be raised twice. 必须设置`StandardDoubleClick`和`StandardClick`值到`true`会引发此事件。You must set the `StandardDoubleClick` and `StandardClick` values of to `true` for this event to be raised. 这些值可能已设置为`true`如果从现有继承 Windows 窗体控件。These values might already be set to `true` if you are inheriting from existing Windows Forms controls. > [!NOTE] > 不会引发以下事件类，除非没有至少一个中集合： ， ， ， ， ， ，和。The following events are not raised for the class unless there is at least one in the collection: , , , , , , and . 如果没有至少一个在集合中，以及用户与选项卡控件的标头进行交互 (其中名称显示)，则引发相应的事件。If there is at least one in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the names appear), the raises the appropriate event. 但是，如果用户交互的选项卡页中，客户端区域内引发相应的事件。However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the raises the appropriate event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件加载文本中列出的文件到控件。The following code example uses the event of a to load text files listed in the into a control. [!code-cpp[Control.DoubleClick#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.DoubleClick/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.DoubleClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.DoubleClick/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.DoubleClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.DoubleClick/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和属性位于屏幕坐标，未工作区坐标。The and properties of the are in screen coordinates, not client coordinates. Visual C# 代码的以下行将属性转换为客户端。The following line of Visual C# code converts the properties to a client . ``` Point clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient(new Point(de.X, de.Y)); ``` > [!NOTE] > 在版本早于[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，如果将放与和Windows 窗体上的事件和拖动某个对象拖到在设计时，`DropDrop`和`DropEnter`事件引发。In versions earlier than [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], if you put a with and events on a Windows Form and drag and drop something onto the at design time, the `DropDrop` and `DropEnter` events are raised. 但是，当你关闭并重新打开该解决方案，和不会再次引发事件。However, when you close and reopen the solution, the and events are not raised again. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 此代码片段演示如何使用事件。This code excerpt demonstrates using the event. 请参阅完整的代码示例的方法。See the method for the complete code example. span.span: Occurs when an object is dragged into the control's bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户拖放操作过程中首次将鼠标光标拖到控件时将引发事件。The event is raised when the user first drags the mouse cursor over the control during a drag-and-drop operation. > [!NOTE] > 在版本早于[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，如果将放与和Windows 窗体上的事件和拖动某个对象拖到在设计时，`DropDrop`和`DropEnter`事件引发。In versions earlier than [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], if you put a with and events on a Windows Form and drag and drop something onto the at design time, the `DropDrop` and `DropEnter` events are raised. 但是，当你关闭并重新打开该解决方案，和不会再次引发事件。However, when you close and reopen the solution, the and events are not raised again. 下面描述与拖放操作相关的事件的引发方式以及引发时间。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 方法确定当前光标位置下的控件。The method determines the control under the current cursor location. 然后检查以确定控件是否有效的放置目标。It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target. 如果控件是有效的放置目标，产生指定的拖放效果引发事件。If the control is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 有关拖放效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 跟踪鼠标光标位置、键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态的更改。Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果用户移出一个窗口，则引发 事件。If the user moves out of a window, the event is raised. - 如果鼠标进入另一个控件，则引发该控件的 。If the mouse enters another control, the for that control is raised. - 如果鼠标移动但停留在同一个控件中，则引发 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the event is raised. 如果键盘或鼠标按钮状态，更改事件引发，并确定是否继续拖动、 放置数据或取消该操作基于值属性的事件的。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the property of the event's . - 如果值是`Continue`、引发事件以继续操作和产生新效果引发事件，从而能够设置适当的视觉反馈。If the value of is `Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和事件成对发生，以便当鼠标移到放置目标时，用户提供的最新反馈有关鼠标位置。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position. - 如果值是`Drop`、 向源返回放置效果值，以便源应用程序可以执行适当的操作的源数据; 例如，如果会剪切数据是移动操作。If the value of is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. - 如果值是`Cancel`、引发事件。If the value of is `Cancel`, the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 和属性位于屏幕坐标，未工作区坐标。The and properties of the are in screen coordinates, not client coordinates. Visual C# 代码的以下行将属性转换为客户端。The following line of Visual C# code converts the properties to a client . ``` Point clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient(new Point(de.X, de.Y)); ``` 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示两个之间拖放操作控件。The following code example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 该示例通过调用方法的拖放操作启动时。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果鼠标已移动的拖放操作启动多个从期间的鼠标位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定要在将拖动的项的索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 该示例还演示如何使用自定义光标拖放操作。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例需要两个光标文件`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`、 存在于应用程序目录，用于自定义拖动和非放置光标，分别。The example requires that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果将使用自定义光标`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已选中。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自定义光标设置事件处理程序。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态评估中事件处理程序右侧`ListBox`，以确定将哪些拖动操作基于 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 和 CTRL + ALT 键的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based on state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期间还确定将发生放置`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是`String`，则设置为`None`中。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to `None` in . 最后，下拉的状态将显示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 要为权限放置的数据`ListBox`中确定事件处理程序和`String`值添加中的适当位置`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果在拖动操作超出边界的窗体中，则采用取消拖放操作事件处理程序。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此代码片段演示如何使用事件。This code excerpt demonstrates using the event. 请参阅完整的代码示例的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户拖出控件的光标或用户取消当前的拖放操作时引发事件。The event is raised when the user drags the cursor out of the control or the user cancels the current drag-and-drop operation. can be set. 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和事件成对发生，以便当鼠标移到放置目标时，用户提供的最新反馈有关鼠标位置。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position. - 如果值是`Drop`、 向源返回放置效果值，以便源应用程序可以执行适当的操作的源数据; 例如，如果会剪切数据是移动操作。If the value of is `Drop`, the drop effect value is Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示两个之间拖放操作控件。The following code example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. MemberSignature.Value: public void DrawToBitmap (System.Drawing.Bitmap bitmap, System.Drawing.Rectangle targetBounds);
.method public hidebysig instance void DrawToBitmap(class System.Drawing.Bitmap bitmap, valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle targetBounds) cil managed
public: void DrawToBitmap(System::Drawing::Bitmap ^ bitmap, System::Drawing::Rectangle targetBounds);

span.span: The bitmap to be drawn to.
The bounds within which the control is rendered.

summary.span: 支持对指定位图的呈现。

span.span: Supports rendering to the specified bitmap.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的 ActiveX 控件不支持方法。The method is not supported for ActiveX controls. 您可以重写事件，并根据需要提供自定义打印逻辑。You can override the event and provide custom printing logic if required. 方法具有以下限制：The method has the following limitations: - 针对大型位图，可能会引发。An might be thrown for large bitmaps. 因计算机而异的最大大小。The maximum allowable size varies by machine. - 不支持`Ink`Windows XP Tablet PC Edition 2005 操作系统的控件。 does not support the `Ink` controls for the Windows XP Tablet PC Edition 2005 operating system. - 不绘制子如果属性设置为`false`。 does not draw a child if the property of the is set to `false`. - 容器内的控件将按相反的顺序呈现。Controls inside containers are rendered in reverse order. - 不是完全正常工作，以; 仅绘制的位图的边框。 is not fully functional for the ; only the border of a bitmap is drawn.

value.span: 如果控件可以对用户交互作出响应，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control can respond to user interaction; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与属性，你可以启用或禁用在运行时的控件。With the property, you can enable or disable controls at run time. 例如，你可以禁用不适用于应用程序的当前状态的控件。For example, you can disable controls that do not apply to the current state of the application. 你也可以禁用以限制其使用的控件。You can also disable a control to restrict its use. 例如，可以禁用按钮，以防止用户单击它。For example, a button can be disabled to prevent the user from clicking it. 如果禁用了控件，则无法选择。If a control is disabled, it cannot be selected. > [!IMPORTANT] > 设置属性`false`不会禁用应用程序的控制框或防止应用程序窗口接收焦点。Setting the property to `false` does not disable the application's control box or prevent the application window from receiving the focus. 当容器控件具有设置为其启用的属性`false`，其包含的所有控件将被都禁用，以及。When a container control has its enabled property set to `false`, all its contained controls are disabled, as well. 例如，如果用户单击的任何控件中已禁用包含控件，会引发任何事件。For example, if the user clicks on any of the controls contained in a disabled control, no events are raised. > [!NOTE] > 当禁用可滚动的控件时，还将禁用滚动条。When a scrollable control is disabled, the scroll bars are also disabled. 例如，已禁用的多行文本框中不能进行滚动才能显示的文本的所有行。For example, a disabled multiline textbox is unable to scroll to display all the lines of text. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并设置一些其通用的属性。The following code example creates a and sets some of its common properties. 该示例创建并设置其组框中。The example creates a and sets its within the group box. 接下来，它将设置属性组框中，并停靠组框中的，到窗体顶部。Next, it sets the property of the group box, and docks the group box to the top of the form. 最后，通过设置禁用分组框属性`false`，这将导致产生包含在要禁用的组框内的所有控件。Lastly, it disables the group box by setting the property to `false`, which causes all controls contained within the group box to be disabled. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CPP/controlproperties.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CS/controlproperties.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/VB/controlproperties.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果尚未完成异步操作，在结果可用之前，将阻止此函数。If the asynchronous operation has not been completed, this function will block until the result is available. > [!NOTE] > 除了属性，在控件上都是线程安全的四种方法： ， ， ，和如果已创建控件的句柄。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created. 调用在后台线程上创建控件的句柄之前可能会导致跨线程调用的非法。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 对于所有其他方法调用，你应使用 invoke 方法之一进行封送处理对控件的线程的调用。For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你通过使用键盘 （选项卡上，按 SHIFT + TAB 等），通过调用更改焦点或方法，或通过设置到当前窗体的属性，将按以下顺序发生焦点事件：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 当你通过使用鼠标或通过调用更改焦点方法，焦点事件按下列顺序发生：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果属性设置为`false`、和事件将被抑制。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. > [!NOTE] > 和事件所抑制的类。The and events are suppressed by the class. 中的等效事件类和事件。The equivalent events in the class are the and events. 和事件层次结构，并将级联向上和向下父链直到达到相应的控件。The and events are hierarchical and will cascade up and down the parent chain until the appropriate control is reached. 例如，假定你将包含两个控件，并且每个控件有一个控件。For example, assume you have a with two controls, and each control has one control. 当从一个移动插入符号到另一个，为引发事件和，和其他引发事件和。When the caret is moved from one to the other, the event is raised for the and , and the event is raised for the other and . > [!CAUTION] > 请不要尝试将焦点设置在， ， ， ， ，或事件处理程序。Do not attempt to set focus from within the , , , , , or event handlers. 这样做会导致你的应用程序或操作系统停止响应。Doing so can cause your application or the operating system to stop responding. 有关详细信息，请参阅`WM_KILLFOCUS`"键盘输入参考"部分中的"消息死锁"部分的主题[关于消息和消息队列](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms644927\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主题。For more information, see the `WM_KILLFOCUS` topic in the "Keyboard Input Reference" section and the "Message Deadlocks" section of the[About Messages and Message Queues](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms644927\(v=vs.85\).aspx)topic. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件来更改的前景色和背景颜色在特定情况下。The following code example uses the event to change the foreground and background colors of a under particular conditions. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回`true`如果控件成功接收输入的焦点。The method returns `true` if the control successfully received input focus. 控件可以在不显示有焦点的任何视觉提示时具有输入的焦点。The control can have the input focus while not displaying any visual cues of having the focus. 下面列出的不可选择控件主要遵循此行为，或任何控件派生自它们。This behavior is primarily observed by the nonselectable controls listed below, or any controls derived from them. 控件可以选中并接收输入的焦点，如果符合下列所有条件：`Selectable`值设置为`true`，该列包含在另一个控件中，并且所有其父控件是否可见且已启用。A control can be selected and receive input focus if all the following are true: the `Selectable` value of is set to `true`, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled. 以下列表中的 Windows 窗体控件不是可选的。The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable. 派生自这些控件的控件也是不可选的。Controls derived from these controls are also not selectable. - - - - - - - （当不存在控件中的链接） (when there is no link present in the control) > [!NOTE] > 低级别的方法主要适用于自定义控件作者。 is a low-level method intended primarily for custom control authors. 相反，应使用应用程序程序员方法或子控件的属性或窗体的方法。Instead, application programmers should use the method or the property for child controls, or the method for forms. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将焦点设置为指定，如果它可以接收焦点。The following code example sets focus to the specified , if it can receive focus. [Visual Basic、 C#][Visual Basic, C#] 下面是如何调整现有字体以使其成为粗体的示例：The following is an example of how to adjust the existing font to make it bold: ```csharp myControl.Font = new Font(myControl.Font, myControl.Font.Style | FontStyle.Bold); ``` ```vb MyControl.Font = New Font(MyControl.Font, _ MyControl.Font.Style Or FontStyle.Bold) ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示给用户，并更改的控件。The following code example displays a to the user and changes the of a control. 此示例要求你拥有与和在其上。This example requires that you have a with and a on it. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event GiveFeedback As GiveFeedbackEventHandler

summary.span: 在执行拖动操作期间发生。

span.span: Occurs during a drag operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启动拖放操作时引发事件。The event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started. 与事件，拖动事件的源可以修改鼠标指针的外观，以便在拖放操作过程中为提供的用户的可视反馈。With the event, the source of a drag event can modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation. 下面描述与拖放操作相关的事件的引发方式以及引发时间。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 方法确定当前光标位置下的控件。The method determines the control under the current cursor location. 然后检查以确定控件是否有效的放置目标。It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target. 如果控件是有效的放置目标，产生指定的拖放效果引发事件。If the control is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 有关拖放效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 跟踪鼠标光标位置、键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态的更改。Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果用户移出一个窗口，则引发 事件。If the user moves out of a window, the event is raised. - 如果鼠标进入另一个控件，则引发该控件的 。If the mouse enters another control, the for that control is raised. - 如果鼠标移动但停留在同一个控件中，则引发 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the event is raised. 如果键盘或鼠标按钮状态，更改事件引发，并确定是否继续拖动、 放置数据或取消该操作基于值属性的事件的。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the property of the event's . - 如果值是`Continue`、引发事件以继续操作和产生新效果引发事件，从而能够设置适当的视觉反馈。If the value of is `Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和事件成对发生，以便当鼠标移到放置目标时，用户提供的最新反馈有关鼠标位置。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position. - 如果值是`Drop`、 向源返回放置效果值，以便源应用程序可以执行适当的操作的源数据; 例如，如果会剪切数据是移动操作。If the value of is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. - 如果值是`Cancel`、引发事件。If the value of is `Cancel`, the event is raised. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示两个之间拖放操作控件。The following code example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 该示例通过调用方法的拖放操作启动时。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果鼠标已移动的拖放操作启动多个从期间的鼠标位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定要在将拖动的项的索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 该示例还演示如何使用自定义光标拖放操作。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例需要两个光标文件`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`、 存在于应用程序目录，用于自定义拖动和非放置光标，分别。The example requires that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果将使用自定义光标`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已选中。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自定义光标设置事件处理程序。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态评估中事件处理程序右侧`ListBox`，以确定将哪些拖动操作基于 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 和 CTRL + ALT 键的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based on state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期间还确定将发生放置`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是`String`，则设置为`None`中。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to `None` in . 最后，下拉的状态将显示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 要为权限放置的数据`ListBox`中确定事件处理程序和`String`值添加中的适当位置`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果在拖动操作超出边界的窗体中，则采用取消拖放操作事件处理程序。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此代码片段演示如何使用事件。This code excerpt demonstrates using the event. 请参阅完整的代码示例的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 在控件接收焦点时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control receives focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你通过使用键盘 （选项卡上，按 SHIFT + TAB 等），通过调用更改焦点或方法，或通过设置到当前窗体的属性，将按以下顺序发生焦点事件：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 当你通过使用鼠标或通过调用更改焦点方法，焦点事件按下列顺序发生：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果属性设置为`false`、和事件将被抑制。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. **请注意**和事件是低级别的焦点事件绑定到的 WM_KILLFOCUS 和 WM_SETFOCUS Windows 消息。**Note** The and events are low-level focus events that are tied to the WM_KILLFOCUS and WM_SETFOCUS Windows messages. 通常情况下，和更新时，仅使用事件或编写自定义控件时。Typically, the and events are only used when updating or when writing custom controls. 改为和事件应用于除之外的所有控件类，它使用和事件。Instead the and events should be used for all controls except the class, which uses the and events. 有关详细信息和事件，请参阅[WM_SETFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646283\(v=vs.85\).aspx)和[WM_KILLFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主题。For more information about the and events, see the [WM_SETFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646283\(v=vs.85\).aspx)and[WM_KILLFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topics. > [!CAUTION] > 请不要尝试将焦点设置在， ， ， ， ，或事件处理程序。Do not attempt to set focus from within the , , , , , or event handlers. 这样做会导致你的应用程序或操作系统停止响应。Doing so can cause your application or the operating system to stop responding. 有关详细信息，请参阅[WM_KILLFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主题。For more information, see the [WM_KILLFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topic. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后将其命名实例`Control1`并确保与事件处理程序事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
