summary.span: 在为控件创建句柄时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a handle is created for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当创建句柄首次显示。A handle is created when the is displayed for the first time. 例如，如果则会创建一个具有设置为`false`、之前将不会引发事件设置为`true`。For example, if a is created that has set to `false`, the event will not be raised until is set to `true`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后将其命名实例`Control1`并确保与事件处理程序事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#37](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#37)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#37](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#37)]

summary.span: 在控件的句柄处于销毁过程中时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control's handle is in the process of being destroyed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期间事件，该控件仍是一个有效的 Windows 控件和可以通过调用重新创建方法。During the event, the control is still a valid Windows control and the can be recreated by calling the method. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后将其命名实例`Control1`并确保与事件处理程序事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasChildren As Boolean
public: property bool HasChildren { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示控件是否包含一个或多个子控件。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the control contains one or more child controls.

value.span: 如果控件包含一个或多个子控件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control contains one or more child controls; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果集合具有大于零，属性将返回`true`。If the collection has a greater than zero, the property will return `true`. 访问属性不会强制创建如果该控件没有任何子级，因此引用此属性可以提供性能益处时遍历树的控件。Accessing the property does not force the creation of a if the control has no children, so referencing this property can provide a performance benefit when walking a tree of controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置和的默认系统颜色的控件。The following code example sets the and of the controls to the default system colors. 如果控件具有任何子控件，则代码以递归方式调用自身。The code recursively calls itself if the control has any child controls. 此代码示例要求你拥有与至少一个子控件; 但是，子容器控制，如或，与它自己的子控件将更好地演示递归。This code example requires that you have a with at least one child control; however, a child container control, like a or , with its own child control(s) would better demonstrate the recursion. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CPP/controlproperties.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CS/controlproperties.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/VB/controlproperties.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Height { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置控件的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the control.

value.span: 控件的高度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The height of the control in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对所做更改和属性值将导致要更改的控件的属性值。Changes made to the and property values cause the property value of the control to change. > [!NOTE] > 派生的控件的最小高度为一个像素。The minimum height for the derived control is one pixel. 默认高度控件为三个像素。The default height for the control is three pixels. 设置的高度控制转移到一个值小于一个将属性值重置为默认高度。Setting the height of the control to a value less than one will reset the property value to the default height. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建三个窗体上控件并通过使用各种大小相关以及与位置相关属性中设置其大小和位置。The following code example creates three controls on a form and sets their size and location by using the various size-related and location-related properties. 此示例要求你拥有，其宽度和高度至少 300 像素。This example requires that you have a that has a width and height of at least 300 pixels. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation/CPP/controlsizelocation.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation/CS/controlsizelocation.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation/VB/controlsizelocation.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event HelpRequested As HelpEventHandler

summary.span: 用户请求控件帮助时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user requests help for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常时引发事件用户按下 F1 键或关联的上下文相关帮助按钮时发生。The event is commonly raised when the user presses the F1 key or an associated context-sensitive help button is clicked. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理事件以便包含四个地址字段的窗体上显示自定义帮助内容。The following code example demonstrates handling the event to display custom Help content on a form containing four address fields. 通过按 F1 键和焦点位于地址字段中，或通过使用上下文相关帮助按钮并单击帮助光标地址字段上的引发事件。The event is raised either by pressing the F1 key with the focus in an address field, or by the using the context-sensitive Help button and clicking the Help cursor on an address field. 属性设置为 true，则指示`HelpRequested`处理事件。The property is set to true to indicate that the `HelpRequested` event is handled. 该示例还演示存储中的帮助文本属性。The example also demonstrates storing the Help text in the property. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/CPP/helpevent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/CS/helpevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/VB/helpevent.vb#1)]

summary.span: 对用户隐藏控件。

span.span: Conceals the control from the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 隐藏控件等效于设置属性`false`。Hiding the control is equivalent to setting the property to `false`. 后调用方法时，属性返回的值`false`直到调用方法。After the method is called, the property returns a value of `false` until the method is called. ## Examples 如果单击该按钮下按下 CTRL 键，下面的代码示例将隐藏按钮。The following code example hides a button if the CTRL key is pressed when the button is clicked. 此示例要求你拥有名为`button1`上。This example requires that you have a named `button1` on a . [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Members4#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Members4/CPP/controlmembers4.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Members4#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Members4/CS/controlmembers4.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Members4#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Members4/VB/controlmembers4.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::ImeMode ImeMode { System::Windows::Forms::ImeMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::ImeMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置控件的输入法编辑器 (IME) 模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the Input Method Editor (IME) mode of the control.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks IME 是一个程序，使用户能够输入复杂字符和符号，如日语汉字字符使用标准键盘。An IME is a program that enables users to enter complex characters and symbols, such as Japanese Kanji characters, using a standard keyboard. 属性通常设置为为旨在只需输入数字值的控件。The property is typically set to for a control that is intended to only enter numeric values. 属性值设置为为类。The property value is set to for the class. 不直接支持输入法编辑器，或允许从 IME 直接输入的大多数类将设置到此属性的值。Most classes that do not directly support Input Method Editors, or allow direct input from an IME, will set the value of this property to . > [!IMPORTANT] > 用户可以以交互方式更改除非已以编程方式设置。The user can interactively change the unless it has been programmatically set to . 在这种情况下，用户将不能使用 IME。In this case, the user will not be able to use the IME. > > 实际上全局输入的模式时，将在 Windows 8 上忽略属性。The property is ignored on Windows 8 when the global input mode is in effect. 有关详细信息，请参阅[交换机文本输入从更改每个线程为每个用户](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=256509)。For more info, see [Switch Text Input Changed from Per-Thread to Per-User](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=256509).

exception.span: 所分配的值不是一个 枚举值。

span.span: The assigned value is not one of the enumeration values.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ImeModeChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 在 属性更改后发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将引发此事件通过以编程方式修改或通过交互更改属性。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or through interaction. 不支持输入法管理器控件将永远不会引发此事件。Controls that do not support Input Method Managers will never raise this event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个事件处理程序时执行属性值更改。The following code example is an event handler that is executed when the property value changes. 类的一些方法的名称模式具有*PropertyName* `Changed`都时引发相应*PropertyName*值发生更改 (*PropertyName*表示对应的属性的名称)。The class has several methods with the name pattern *PropertyName*`Changed` that are raised when the corresponding *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下面的代码示例更改的显示货币数据。The following code example changes the of a displaying currency data. 该示例将文本转换为十进制数和更改到如果数字为负和如果数值为正。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 此示例要求你拥有包含。This example requires that you have a that contains a . [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents/CPP/propertychangedevents.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents/CS/propertychangedevents.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents/VB/propertychangedevents.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void InitLayout() cil managed

summary.span: 在将控件添加到另一个容器之后调用。

span.span: Called after the control has been added to another container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在将控件添加到容器之后立即调用方法。The method is called immediately after adding a control to a container. 方法使控件能够将基于其容器其布局状态初始化。The method enables a control to initialize its layout state based on its container. 例如，你通常会应用锚定和停靠到中的控件方法。For example, you would typically apply anchoring and docking to the control in the method.

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便正确显示控件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the control is displayed correctly.

summary.span: 使控件的特定区域无效并向控件发送绘制消息。

span.span: Invalidates a specific region of the control and causes a paint message to be sent to the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Invalidate() cil managed

summary.span: 使控件的整个图面无效并导致重绘控件。

span.span: Invalidates the entire surface of the control and causes the control to be redrawn.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法不会强制同步绘制; 若要强制同步绘制，调用方法之后调用方法。Calling the method does not force a synchronous paint; to force a synchronous paint, call the method after calling the method. 当不带任何参数调用此方法时，整个工作区添加到更新区域。When this method is called with no parameters, the entire client area is added to the update region. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用户将图像或图像文件拖动到窗体，并将其显示在上的点被删除。The following code example enables the user to drag an image or image file onto the form, and have it be displayed at the point on it is dropped. 方法被重写来重绘图像绘制窗体时每次; 否则该映像将只持续到下一步重新绘制。The method is overridden to repaint the image each time the form is painted; otherwise the image would only persist until the next repainting. 事件处理方法确定要拖动到窗体中数据的类型，并提供适当的反馈。The event-handling method determines the type of data being dragged into the form and provides the appropriate feedback. 事件处理方法在窗体上显示的图像，如果可以从数据创建。The event-handling method displays the image on the form, if an can be created from the data. 因为和值屏幕坐标，该示例使用方法来将它们转换成工作区坐标。Because the and values are screen coordinates, the example uses the method to convert them to client coordinates. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations/CPP/imagedrag.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations/CS/imagedrag.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations/VB/imagedrag.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法不会强制同步绘制; 若要强制同步绘制，调用方法之后调用方法。Calling the method does not force a synchronous paint; to force a synchronous paint, call the method after calling the method. 当不带任何参数调用此方法时，整个工作区添加到更新区域。When this method is called with no parameters, the entire client area is added to the update region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后将其命名实例`Control1`并确保与事件处理程序事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#40)]

summary.span: 在拥有此控件的基础窗口句柄的线程上执行委托。

span.span: Executes a delegate on the thread that owns the control's underlying window handle.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object Invoke(class System.Delegate method) cil managed
Public Function Invoke (method As Delegate) As Object

param.name: method
param.span: 包含要在控件的线程上下文中调用的方法的委托。

span.span: A delegate that contains a method to be called in the control's thread context.

summary.span: 在拥有此控件的基础窗口句柄的线程上执行指定的委托。

span.span: Executes the specified delegate on the thread that owns the control's underlying window handle.

returns.span: 正在被调用的委托的返回值，或者如果委托没有返回值，则为 。

span.span: The return value from the delegate being invoked, or if the delegate has no return value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委托是类似于 C 或 c + + 语言中的函数指针。Delegates are similar to function pointers in C or C++ languages. 委托封装对委托对象中的方法的引用。Delegates encapsulate a reference to a method inside a delegate object. 然后可以传递给调用所引用的方法的代码的委托对象和要调用的方法可以在编译时未知。The delegate object can then be passed to code that calls the referenced method, and the method to be invoked can be unknown at compile time. 与在 C 或 c + + 中的函数指针，不同委托是面向对象的、 类型安全和更安全。Unlike function pointers in C or C++, delegates are object-oriented, type-safe, and more secure. 方法搜索沿控件的父链直到它找到的控件或窗体具有一个窗口处理如果尚不存在当前控件的基础窗口句柄。The method searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that has a window handle if the current control's underlying window handle does not exist yet. 如果找不到任何合适的句柄，方法将引发异常。If no appropriate handle can be found, the method will throw an exception. 在调用期间引发的异常将传播回调用方。Exceptions that are raised during the call will be propagated back to the caller. > [!NOTE] > 除了属性，在控件上都是线程安全的四种方法： ， ， ，和如果已创建控件的句柄。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created. 调用在后台线程上创建控件的句柄之前可能会导致跨线程调用的非法。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 对于所有其他方法调用，你应使用 invoke 方法之一进行封送处理对控件的线程的调用。For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread. 委托可以是实例，在这种情况下发件人参数将包含此控件，并且事件参数将包含。The delegate can be an instance of , in which case the sender parameter will contain this control, and the event parameter will contain . 委托还可以是实例，或采用 void 参数列表的任何其他委托。The delegate can also be an instance of , or any other delegate that takes a void parameter list. 调用或委托会更快比其他类型的委托的调用。A call to an or delegate will be faster than a call to another type of delegate. > [!NOTE] > 如果应处理该消息的线程不再处于活动状态，则可能引发异常。An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示包含一个委托的控件。The following code example shows controls that contain a delegate. 委托封装的方法，将项添加到列表框中，并拥有的窗体的基础句柄的线程上执行此方法。The delegate encapsulates a method that adds items to the list box, and this method is executed on the thread that owns the underlying handle of the form. 当用户单击按钮，`Invoke`运行委托。When the user clicks on the button, `Invoke` runs the delegate. [!code-cpp[Control_Invoke2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_Invoke2/CPP/control_invoke2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control_Invoke2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_Invoke2/CS/control_invoke2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control_Invoke2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_Invoke2/VB/control_invoke2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委托是类似于 C 或 c + + 语言中的函数指针。Delegates are similar to function pointers in C or C++ languages. 委托封装对委托对象中的方法的引用。Delegates encapsulate a reference to a method inside a delegate object. 然后可以传递给调用所引用的方法的代码的委托对象和要调用的方法可以在编译时未知。The delegate object can then be passed to code that calls the referenced method, and the method to be invoked can be unknown at compile time. 与在 C 或 c + + 中的函数指针，不同委托是面向对象的、 类型安全和更安全。Unlike function pointers in C or C++, delegates are object-oriented, type-safe, and more secure. 如果控件的句柄尚不存在，此方法搜索沿控件的父链中，直到它找到的控件或窗体具有窗口句柄。If the control's handle does not exist yet, this method searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that does have a window handle. 如果找不到任何合适的句柄，此方法将引发异常。If no appropriate handle can be found, this method throws an exception. 在调用期间引发的异常将传播回调用方。Exceptions that are raised during the call will be propagated back to the caller. > [!NOTE] > 除了属性，在控件上都是线程安全的四种方法： ， ， ，和如果已创建控件的句柄。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created. 调用在后台线程上创建控件的句柄之前可能会导致跨线程调用的非法。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 对于所有其他方法调用，你应使用 invoke 方法之一进行封送处理对控件的线程的调用。For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread. 委托可以是实例，在这种情况下发件人参数将包含此控件，并且事件参数将包含。The delegate can be an instance of , in which case the sender parameter will contain this control, and the event parameter will contain . 委托还可以是实例，或采用 void 参数列表的任何其他委托。The delegate can also be an instance of , or any other delegate that takes a void parameter list. 调用或委托会更快比其他类型的委托的调用。A call to an or delegate will be faster than a call to another type of delegate. > [!NOTE] > 如果应处理该消息的线程不再处于活动状态，则可能引发异常。An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示包含一个委托的控件。The following code example shows controls that contain a delegate. 该委托封装的方法，将项添加到列表框中，并拥有的窗体中，使用指定的参数的基础句柄的线程上执行此方法。The delegate encapsulates a method that adds items to the list box, and this method is executed on the thread that owns the underlying handle of the form, using the specified arguments. 当用户单击按钮，`Invoke`运行委托。When the user clicks on the button, `Invoke` runs the delegate. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InvokeRequired As Boolean
public: property bool InvokeRequired { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示调用方在对控件进行方法调用时是否必须调用 Invoke 方法，因为调用方位于创建控件所在的线程以外的线程中。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the caller must call an invoke method when making method calls to the control because the caller is on a different thread than the one the control was created on.

value.span: 如果控件的 是在与调用线程不同的线程上创建的（说明您必须通过 Invoke 方法对控件进行调用），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control's was created on a different thread than the calling thread (indicating that you must make calls to the control through an invoke method); otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 窗体中的控件绑定到特定线程，不是线程安全。Controls in Windows Forms are bound to a specific thread and are not thread safe. 因此，如果要从另一个线程调用控件的方法，你必须使用其中一个控件的调用封送到合适的线程调用的方法。Therefore, if you are calling a control's method from a different thread, you must use one of the control's invoke methods to marshal the call to the proper thread. 此属性可以用于确定是否必须调用 invoke 方法，这会非常有用，如果你不知道在哪个线程拥有一个控件。This property can be used to determine if you must call an invoke method, which can be useful if you do not know what thread owns a control. > [!NOTE] > 除了属性，在控件上都是线程安全地调用的四种方法： ，，和如果已创建控件的句柄。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe to call: ,, and if the handle for the control has already been created. 调用在后台线程上创建控件的句柄之前可能会导致跨线程调用的非法。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 对于所有其他方法调用，应使用以下方法之一从另一个线程调用时调用的方法。For all other method calls, you should use one of these invoke methods when calling from a different thread. 如果控件的句柄尚不存在，搜索直到它找到的控件或具有窗口句柄的窗体上控件的父链。If the control's handle does not yet exist, searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that does have a window handle. 如果找不到任何合适的句柄，方法返回`false`。If no appropriate handle can be found, the method returns `false`. 这意味着，可以返回`false`如果不是必需的 （调用发生在同一线程），或如果已创建该控件在不同线程的创建，但尚未创建控件的句柄。This means that can return `false` if is not required (the call occurs on the same thread), or if the control was created on a different thread but the control's handle has not yet been created. 在控件的句柄尚未创建的情况下，你不应只需调用属性、 方法或事件在控件上。In the case where the control's handle has not yet been created, you should not simply call properties, methods, or events on the control. 这可能会导致在隔离而无需消息泵线程上的控件并使该应用程序不稳定的后台线程上创建控件的句柄。This might cause the control's handle to be created on the background thread, isolating the control on a thread without a message pump and making the application unstable. 可以通过还检查的值来避免这种情况时返回`false`后台线程上。You can protect against this case by also checking the value of when returns `false` on a background thread. 如果尚未创建控件句柄，必须等待，直到它已创建，然后再调或。If the control handle has not yet been created, you must wait until it has been created before calling or . 通常情况下，会发生此情况仅在应用程序的主窗体的构造函数中创建后台线程 (如`Application.Run(new MainForm())`，然后显示窗体或`Application.Run`已调用。Typically, this happens only if a background thread is created in the constructor of the primary form for the application (as in `Application.Run(new MainForm())`, before the form has been shown or `Application.Run` has been called. 一种解决方案是等待，直到在开始后台线程之前已创建窗体的句柄。One solution is to wait until the form's handle has been created before starting the background thread. 请通过调用强制创建句柄属性，或者等待事件启动后台进程。Either force handle creation by calling the property, or wait until the event to start the background process. 更好的解决方案是使用`SynchronizationContext`返回而不是用于跨线程封送处理的控件。An even better solution is to use the `SynchronizationContext` returned by rather than a control for cross-thread marshaling. > [!NOTE] > 如果应处理该消息的线程不再处于活动状态，则可能引发异常。An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active. 有关多线程 Windows 窗体控件的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 使用后台线程搜索文件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-use-a-background-thread-to-search-for-files.md)和[如何： 向 Windows 窗体控件进行线程安全的调用](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-make-thread-safe-calls-to-windows-forms-controls.md)。For more information about multithreaded Windows Forms controls, see [How to: Use a Background Thread to Search for Files](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-use-a-background-thread-to-search-for-files.md) and [How to: Make Thread-Safe Calls to Windows Forms Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-make-thread-safe-calls-to-windows-forms-controls.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性返回`true`，该控件的释放，不再作为有效的 Windows 控件被引用。When this property returns `true`, the control is disposed of and can no longer be referenced as a valid Windows control. 即使控件的实例已释放，它仍保留在内存中直到从通过垃圾回收的内存中删除。Even though the instance of a control is disposed of, it is still maintained in memory until it is removed from memory through garbage collection. 当释放一个控件时，不能调用其方法。When a control is disposed, you cannot call its method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法来确定指定的字符是否`charCode`参数为控件需要的输入的字符。Call the method to determine whether the character specified by the `charCode` parameter is an input character that the control wants. 在窗口消息预处理，以确定是否应经过预处理，或直接向控件发送指定的输入的字符过程中调用此方法。This method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the specified input character should be preprocessed or sent directly to the control. 如果返回`true`，直接向控件发送指定的字符。If returns `true`, the specified character is sent directly to the control. 如果返回`false`，预处理和仅发送到控件，如果它不使用预处理阶段时指定的字符。If returns `false`, the specified character is preprocessed and only sent to the control if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase. 字符的预处理包括检查的字符是否另一个控件的助记键。The preprocessing of a character includes checking whether the character is a mnemonic of another control.

permission.span: 为用于继承类来调用此方法的所有窗口。

span.span: for all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.

returns.span: 如果指定的键是常规输入键，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法来确定指定的键是否`keyData`参数是控件需要输入的键。Call the method to determine whether the key specified by the `keyData` parameter is an input key that the control wants. 在窗口消息预处理，以确定是否应经过预处理，或直接向控件发送指定的输入的键过程中调用此方法。This method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the specified input key should be preprocessed or sent directly to the control. 如果返回`true`，直接向控件发送指定的键。If returns `true`, the specified key is sent directly to the control. 如果返回`false`，指定的键是预处理，如果它不使用预处理阶段时仅向控件发送。If returns `false`, the specified key is preprocessed and only sent to the control if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase. 经过预处理的密钥包括选项卡、 返回、 ESC、 和的向上箭头、 向下箭头、 向左键和向右箭头键。Keys that are preprocessed include the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and the UP ARROW, DOWN ARROW, LEFT ARROW, and RIGHT ARROW keys. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法控件。The following code example shows you how to override the method for a control. 在此示例中，`TabTextBox`类处理 TAB 键。In this example, the `TabTextBox` class handles the TAB key. 当`TabTextBox`具有焦点并且用户按 TAB 键在文本插入点，添加四个空格替换任何所选的文本。When the `TabTextBox` has the focus and the user presses the TAB key four spaces are added at the text insertion point, replacing any selected text. 默认情况下，控件处理 TAB 键，通过将输入的焦点移动到下一个控件。By default, the control handles the TAB key by moving the input focus to the next control. 在这种情况下，按键绝不会到达方法重写。In this case, the keypress never reaches the method override. 若要防止此默认行为，方法重写返回`true`当用户按 TAB 键。To prevent this default behavior, the method override returns `true` when the user presses the TAB key. 对于所有其他按键，方法重写返回时调用的方法的基类版本的结果。For all other keypresses, the method override returns the result of calling the base-class version of the method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey/cs/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey/vb/form1.vb#0)]

summary.span: 在控件有焦点的情况下按下键时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a key is pressed while the control has focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 键事件按下列顺序发生：Key events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 若要仅在窗体级别处理键盘事件而不允许其他控件可以接收键盘事件，将设置中窗体的属性到事件处理方法`true`。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable other controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in your form's event-handling method to `true`. 自动由控件处理某些键，例如选项卡、 返回、 ESC、 和箭头键。Certain keys, such as the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and arrow keys are handled by controls automatically. 若要使这些键引发事件，必须重写窗体上的每个控件中的方法。To have these keys raise the event, you must override the method in each control on your form. 重写的代码需要确定按下了某个特殊键，并返回的值`true`。The code for the override of the would need to determine if one of the special keys is pressed and return a value of `true`. 而不是重写方法，你可以处理事件并设置属性`true`。Instead of overriding the method, you can handle the event and set the property to `true`. 有关代码示例，请参阅事件。For a code example, see the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件，以确定文本框控件中输入的字符的类型。The following code example uses the event to determine the type of character entered into the control. [!code-cpp[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 键事件按下列顺序发生：Key events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 空间和退格符以外的非字符键不会引发事件; 但是，不要引发非字符键和事件。The event is not raised by non-character keys other than space and backspace; however, the non-character keys do raise the and events. 使用属性示例的键击在运行时和使用或修改的常见击键的子集。Use the property to sample keystrokes at run time and to consume or modify a subset of common keystrokes. 若要仅在窗体级别处理键盘事件而不允许其他控件可以接收键盘事件，将设置中窗体的属性到事件处理方法`true`。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable other controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in your form's event-handling method to `true`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件，以防止从输入控件的字符。The following code example uses the event to prevent characters from entering the control. [!code-cpp[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 键事件按下列顺序发生：Key events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 若要仅在窗体级别处理键盘事件而不允许其他控件可以接收键盘事件，将设置中窗体的属性到事件处理方法`true`。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable other controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in your form's event-handling method to `true`. 自动由控件处理某些键，例如选项卡、 返回、 ESC、 和箭头键。Certain keys, such as the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and arrow keys are handled by controls automatically. 若要使这些键引发事件，必须重写窗体上的每个控件中的方法。To have these keys raise the event, you must override the method in each control on your form. 重写的代码需要确定按下了某个特殊键，并返回的值`true`。The code for the override of would need to determine if one of the special keys is pressed and return a value of `true`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件和类来显示给用户的弹出样式帮助。The following code example uses the event with the class to display pop-up style help to the user. [!code-cpp[Control.KeyUp#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyUp/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.KeyUp#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyUp/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.KeyUp#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyUp/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在控件应重新定位其子控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a control should reposition its child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生时添加或删除时的边界的控件更改，以及在出现的其他更改可能会影响控件的布局子控件。The event occurs when child controls are added or removed, when the bounds of the control changes, and when other changes occur that can affect the layout of the control. 可以使用抑制布局事件和方法。The layout event can be suppressed using the and methods. 挂起的布局，可在控件上执行多个操作，而无需执行一次布局针对每项更改。Suspending layout enables you to perform multiple actions on a control without having to perform a layout for each change. 例如，如果你调整大小，并将控件移动，每个操作都会引发事件。For example, if you resize and move a control, each operation would raise a event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例中心在的屏幕中事件。The following code example centers a on the screen in the event. 这将保留表单居中当用户调整其大小时。This will keep the form centered as the user resizes it. 此示例需要你已创建了控件。This example requires that you have created a control. [!code-cpp[Control.Layout#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Layout/CPP/layout.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.Layout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Layout/CS/layout.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.Layout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Layout/VB/layout.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Leave As EventHandler

summary.span: 在输入焦点离开控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the input focus leaves the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你通过使用键盘 （选项卡上，按 SHIFT + TAB 等），通过调用更改焦点或方法，或通过设置到当前窗体的属性，将按以下顺序发生焦点事件：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 当你通过使用鼠标或通过调用更改焦点方法，焦点事件按下列顺序发生：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果属性设置为`false`、和事件将被抑制。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. > [!NOTE] > 和事件所抑制的类。The and events are suppressed by the class. 中的等效事件类和事件。The equivalent events in the class are the and events. 和事件层次结构，并将级联向上和向下父链直到达到相应的控件。The and events are hierarchical and will cascade up and down the parent chain until the appropriate control is reached. 例如，假定你将包含两个控件，并且每个控件有一个控件。For example, assume you have a with two controls, and each control has one control. 当从一个移动插入符号到另一个，为引发事件和，和其他引发事件和。When the caret is moved from one to the other, the event is raised for the and , and the event is raised for the other and . > [!CAUTION] > 请不要尝试将焦点设置在， ， ， ， ，或事件处理程序。Do not attempt to set focus from within the , , , , , or event handlers. 这样做会导致你的应用程序或操作系统停止响应。Doing so can cause your application or the operating system to stop responding. 有关详细信息，请参阅[WM_KILLFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主题。For more information, see the [WM_KILLFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topic. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件，以将控件重置为其以前的状态。The following code example uses the event to reset a control to its former state. [!code-cpp[Control.Enter#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Enter/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.Enter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Enter/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.Enter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Enter/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值等于属性的控件属性值。The property value is equivalent to the property of the property value of the control. 对所做更改和属性值将导致要更改的控件的属性值。Changes made to the and property values cause the property value of the control to change. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建三个窗体上控件并通过使用各种大小相关以及与位置相关属性中设置其大小和位置。The following code example creates three controls on a form and sets their size and location by using the various size-related and location-related properties. 此示例要求你拥有，其宽度和高度至少 300 像素。This example requires that you have a that has a width and height of at least 300 pixels. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation/CPP/controlsizelocation.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation/CS/controlsizelocation.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation/VB/controlsizelocation.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the coordinates of the upper-left corner of the control relative to the upper-left corner of its container.

value.span: ，表示控件的左上角相对于其容器的左上角。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为类是值类型 (`Structure`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]， `struct` Visual C# 中)，它返回的值，这意味着访问该属性返回的控件的左上角点副本。Because the class is a value type (`Structure` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], `struct` in Visual C#), it is returned by value, meaning accessing the property returns a copy of the upper-left point of the control. 因此，调整或属性返回此属性将不会影响， ， ，或控件的属性值。So, adjusting the or properties of the returned from this property will not affect the , , , or property values of the control. 若要调整这些属性分别设置每个属性值，或设置为一个新的属性。To adjust these properties set each property value individually, or set the property with a new . 如果是、属性值表示的左上角以屏幕坐标。If the is a , the property value represents the upper-left corner of the in screen coordinates. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并设置一些其通用的属性。The following code example creates a and sets some of its common properties. 该示例创建并设置其组框中。The example creates a and sets its within the group box. 接下来，它将设置属性组框中，并停靠组框中的，到窗体顶部。Next, it sets the property of the group box, and docks the group box to the top of the form. 最后，通过设置禁用分组框属性`false`，这将导致产生包含在要禁用的组框内的所有控件。Lastly, it disables the group box by setting the property to `false`, which causes all controls contained within the group box to be disabled. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CPP/controlproperties.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CS/controlproperties.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/VB/controlproperties.vb#2)]

summary.span: 在控件失去焦点时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control loses focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你通过使用键盘 （选项卡上，按 SHIFT + TAB 等），通过调用更改焦点或方法，或通过设置到当前窗体的属性，将按以下顺序发生焦点事件：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 当你通过使用鼠标或通过调用更改焦点方法，焦点事件按下列顺序发生：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果属性设置为`false`、和事件将被抑制。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. 如果属性设置为`true`中事件委托中，通常会发生后的所有事件事件将被抑制。If the property of the is set to `true` in the event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the event are suppressed. > [!NOTE] > 和事件是低级别的焦点事件绑定到的 WM_KILLFOCUS 和 WM_SETFOCUS Windows 消息。The and events are low-level focus events that are tied to the WM_KILLFOCUS and WM_SETFOCUS Windows messages. 通常情况下，和更新时，仅使用事件或编写自定义控件时。Typically, the and events are only used when updating or when writing custom controls. 改为和事件应用于除之外的所有控件类，它使用和事件。Instead the and events should be used for all controls except the class, which uses the and events. 有关详细信息和事件，请参阅[WM_KILLFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx)和[WM_KILLFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主题。For more information about the and events, see the [WM_KILLFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx) and [WM_KILLFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topics. > [!CAUTION] > 请不要尝试将焦点设置在， ， ， ， ，或事件处理程序。Do not attempt to set focus from within the , , , , , or event handlers. 这样做会导致你的应用程序或操作系统停止响应。Doing so can cause your application or the operating system to stop responding. 有关详细信息，请参阅[WM_KILLFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主题。For more information, see the [WM_KILLFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topic. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示为 TextBox1 验证文本。The following code example demonstrates validating the text for TextBox1. 它还演示如何处理事件通过设置TextBox1 中的文本属性。It also demonstrates handling the event by setting the property to the text in TextBox1. 使用的代码示例方法来检查是否有错误，然后打开文件对话框。The code example used the method to check for an error before opening the file dialog box. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个窗体包含名为`TextBox1`、名为`OpenFileDialog1`、名为`Button1`，和名为`ErrorProvider1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form containing a named `TextBox1`, an named `OpenFileDialog1`, a named `Button1`, and an named `ErrorProvider1`. 确保所有事件都都其事件处理程序关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseCaptureChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 当控件失去鼠标捕获时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control loses mouse capture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在极少数情况下，你可能需要检测到意外的输入。In rare scenarios, you might need to detect unexpected input. 例如，考虑以下方案。For example, consider the following scenarios. - 在鼠标操作中，用户通过按 Windows 键或 CTRL + ESC 打开开始菜单。During a mouse operation, the user opens the Start menu by pressing the Windows key or CTRL+ESC. - 在鼠标操作中，用户切换到另一个程序通过按 ALT + TAB。During a mouse operation, the user switches to another program by pressing ALT+TAB. - 在鼠标操作中，另一个程序会显示任何窗口或采用焦点离开当前的应用程序的消息框。During a mouse operation, another program displays a window or a message box that takes focus away from the current application. 鼠标操作可以包括，单击并按住鼠标窗体或控件，或执行鼠标拖动操作。Mouse operations can include clicking and holding the mouse on a form or a control, or performing a mouse drag operation. 如果你有来检测何时窗体或控件失去鼠标捕获，对于这些数据和相关的意外情况下，你可以使用事件。If you have to detect when a form or a control loses mouse capture for these and related unexpected scenarios, you can use the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示事件控件。The following code example demonstrates the event for a control. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseCaptureChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.control.mousecapturechanged/cs/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseCaptureChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.control.mousecapturechanged/vb/form1.vb#1)] 若要测试此示例中，它在调试器中按 F5 运行。To test this example, run it in the debugger by pressing F5. 打开**输出**Visual Studio 窗口中的，这样您可以看到时引发事件。Open the **Output** window in Visual Studio so that you can see when events are raised. 单击，并注意下面的输出。Click the and notice the following output. `button1_MouseDown` `button1_MouseUp` `button1_MouseCaptureChanged` 现在上, 单击并按住鼠标左键控件。Now, click and hold the left mouse button on the control. 在仍单击鼠标，同时按 ALT + TAB 切换到另一个程序。While still clicking the mouse, press ALT+TAB to switch to another program. 请注意，使你能够可能处理这种情况下引发事件。Notice that the event is raised enabling you to potentially handle this scenario. 具体取决于你的操作，可能不会引发事件。Depending on your actions, the event might not be raised. 你还可以尝试使用的 Windows 键或 CTRL + ESC 此测试。You can also try this test with the Windows key or CTRL+ESC. `button1_MouseDown` `button1_MouseCaptureChanged`

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseClick As MouseEventHandler

summary.span: 用鼠标单击控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control is clicked by the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 释放鼠标按钮，当光标位于控件上方通常可引发以下一系列的控件中的事件：Depressing a mouse button when the cursor is over a control typically raises the following series of events from the control: 1. 事件。 event. 2. 事件。 event. 3. 事件。 event. 4. 事件。 event. 为此，各种事件不能禁用控件的类中。For this to occur, the various events cannot be disabled in the control's class. 两次发生足够时间，具体由用户的操作系统的鼠标设置确定将生成的单击而不是第二个事件事件。Two single clicks that occur close enough in time, as determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system, will generate a event instead of the second event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 事件是逻辑上控件的事件。 events are logically higher-level events of a control. 它们通常由其他操作，如按 ENTER 键在控件有焦点时引发。They are often raised by other actions, such as pressing the ENTER key when the control has focus. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后将其命名实例`Control1`并确保与事件处理程序事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#54](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#54)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#54](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#54)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseDoubleClick As MouseEventHandler

summary.span: 用鼠标双击控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control is double clicked by the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户释放鼠标按钮两次连续快速地，当光标位于控件上方时发生事件。The event occurs when the user depresses a mouse button twice in quick succession when the cursor is over the control. 将两次单击与双击分隔开的时间间隔由用户的操作系统的鼠标设置确定。The time interval that separates two single clicks from a double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system. 在这样的用户操作发生时，将由控件引发以下一系列事件：The following series of events is raised by the control when such a user action takes place: 1. 事件。 event. 2. 事件。 event. 3. 事件。 event. 4. 事件。 event. 5. 事件。 event. 6. 事件。 event. 7. 事件。 event. 8. 事件。 event. 为此，各种事件不能禁用控件的类中。For this to occur, the various events cannot be disabled in the control's class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 事件是逻辑上控件的事件。 events are logically higher-level events of a control. 它们可能会引发由其他用户操作，如快捷键组合。They may be raised by other user actions, such as shortcut key combinations. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后将其命名实例`Control1`并确保与事件处理程序事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#55](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#55)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#55](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#55)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseDown As MouseEventHandler

summary.span: 当鼠标指针位于控件上并按下鼠标键时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer is over the control and a mouse button is pressed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 鼠标事件按下列顺序发生：Mouse events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. / / 4. 5. > [!NOTE] > 不会引发以下事件类，除非没有至少一个中集合： ， ， ， ， ， ，和。The following events are not raised for the class unless there is at least one in the collection: , , , , , , and . 如果没有至少一个在集合中，以及用户与选项卡控件的标头进行交互 (其中名称显示)，则引发相应的事件。If there is at least one in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the names appear), the raises the appropriate event. 但是，如果用户交互的选项卡页中，客户端区域内引发相应的事件。However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the raises the appropriate event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用不同的鼠标事件上绘制的路径鼠标。The following code example demonstrates using different mouse events to draw the path of the mouse on a . 一条直线段添加到每个和发生的事件。A line segment is added to the for each and events that occur. 要更新该图形为调用方法上每个`MouseDown`和`MouseUp`事件。To update the graphics, the method is called for the on each `MouseDown` and `MouseUp` event. 此外，向上或向下时滚动的图形路径事件发生。In addition, the graphic path is scrolled up or down when the event occurs. 其他鼠标事件，如，在屏幕上以及标识。Additional mouse events, like , are identified on screen as well. 在屏幕上还显示了从鼠标有关的其他信息类。Also displayed on the screen is additional information about the mouse from the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent/CPP/mouseeventexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent/CS/mouseeventexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent/VB/mouseeventexample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseEnter As EventHandler

summary.span: 在鼠标指针进入控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer enters the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 鼠标事件按下列顺序发生：Mouse events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. / / 4. 5. > [!NOTE] > 不会引发以下事件类，除非没有至少一个中集合： ， ， ， ， ， ，和。The following events are not raised for the class unless there is at least one in the collection: , , , , , , and . 如果没有至少一个在集合中，以及用户与选项卡控件的标头进行交互 (其中名称显示)，则引发相应的事件。If there is at least one in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the names appear), the raises the appropriate event. 但是，如果用户交互的选项卡页中，客户端区域内引发相应的事件。However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the raises the appropriate event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用不同的鼠标事件上绘制的路径鼠标。The following code example demonstrates using different mouse events to draw the path of the mouse on a . 一条直线段添加到每个和发生的事件。A line segment is added to the for each and events that occur. 要更新该图形为调用方法上每个`MouseDown`和`MouseUp`事件。To update the graphics, the method is called for the on each `MouseDown` and `MouseUp` event. 此外，向上或向下时滚动的图形路径事件发生。In addition, the graphic path is scrolled up or down when the event occurs. 其他鼠标事件，如，在屏幕上以及标识。Additional mouse events, like , are identified on screen as well. 在屏幕上还显示了从鼠标有关的其他信息类。Also displayed on the screen is additional information about the mouse from the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个典型用途是当鼠标悬停在控件 （"悬停矩形"） 周围的指定区域中控件上时显示工具提示。A typical use of is to display a tool tip when the mouse pauses on a control within a specified area around the control (the "hover rectangle"). 引发此事件所需的暂停指定以毫秒为单位通过属性。The pause required for this event to be raised is specified in milliseconds by the property. 定义和检测到门户中的事件和属性。The event is defined and detected in connection with the and properties. 鼠标事件按下列顺序发生：Mouse events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. / / 4. 5. > [!NOTE] > 不会引发以下事件类，除非没有至少一个中集合： ， ， ， ， ， ，和。The following events are not raised for the class unless there is at least one in the collection: , , , , , , and . 如果没有至少一个在集合中，以及用户与选项卡控件的标头进行交互 (其中名称显示)，则引发相应的事件。If there is at least one in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the names appear), the raises the appropriate event. 但是，如果用户交互的选项卡页中，客户端区域内引发相应的事件。However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the raises the appropriate event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用不同的鼠标事件上绘制的路径鼠标。The following code example demonstrates using different mouse events to draw the path of the mouse on a . 一条直线段添加到每个和发生的事件。A line segment is added to the for each and events that occur. 要更新该图形为调用方法上每个`MouseDown`和`MouseUp`事件。To update the graphics, the method is called for the on each `MouseDown` and `MouseUp` event. 此外，向上或向下时滚动的图形路径事件发生。In addition, the graphic path is scrolled up or down when the event occurs. 其他鼠标事件，如，在屏幕上以及标识。Additional mouse events, like , are identified on screen as well. 在屏幕上还显示了从鼠标有关的其他信息类。Also displayed on the screen is additional information about the mouse from the class. summary.span: 获取鼠标光标的位置（以屏幕坐标表示）。

span.span: Gets the position of the mouse cursor in screen coordinates.

value.span: ，它包含鼠标光标相对于屏幕左上角的坐标。

span.span: A that contains the coordinates of the mouse cursor relative to the upper-left corner of the screen.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回表示引用属性次鼠标光标位置。The property returns a that represents the mouse cursor position at the time the property was referenced. 这些坐标指示的位置在屏幕上，不是相对于控件，并且无论是否将光标定位在控件返回。The coordinates indicate the position on the screen, not relative to the control, and are returned regardless of whether the cursor is positioned over the control. 屏幕的左上角的坐标为 0，0。The coordinates of the upper-left corner of the screen are 0,0. 属性等同于属性。The property is identical to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将到可编辑状态，当用户按下 ALT + E，而鼠标光标位于树节点的标签。The following code example puts a label into an editable state when the user presses ALT+E while the mouse cursor is over the tree node. 在用户完成后编辑的标签，标签之前，无法编辑再次再次按 ALT + E 键组合。After the user is done editing the label, the labels cannot be edited again until the ALT+E key combination is pressed again. 此示例要求你拥有上。This example requires that you have a on a . 树视图还应该至少一个中其集合。The tree view should also have at least one in its collection. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseWheel As MouseEventHandler

summary.span: 在控件有焦点且鼠标轮移动时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the mouse wheel moves while the control has focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当处理务必遵循与鼠标滚轮关联的用户界面 (UI) 标准的事件。When handling the event it is important to follow the user interface (UI) standards associated with the mouse wheel. 属性值指示已移动的量鼠标滚轮。The property value indicates the amount the mouse wheel has been moved. 当累积的增量是加上或减去 120 时，应滚动 UI。The UI should scroll when the accumulated delta is plus or minus 120. UI 应该滚动逻辑返回的行数达到每个增量值的属性。The UI should scroll the number of logical lines returned by the property for every delta value reached. 你还可以滚动更平稳地中较小 120 单位的增量，但是之比应保持不变，即每 120 增量单位的滚轮移动滚动的行。You can also scroll more smoothly in smaller that 120 unit increments, however the ratio should remain constant, that is lines scrolled per 120 delta units of wheel movement. 有关处理鼠标滚轮消息的详细信息，请参阅[WM_MOUSEWHEEL](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms645617\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主题。For more information about handling mouse wheel messages, see the[WM_MOUSEWHEEL](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms645617\(v=vs.85\).aspx)topic. 鼠标事件按下列顺序发生：Mouse events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. / / 4. 5. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用不同的鼠标事件上绘制的路径鼠标。The following code example demonstrates using different mouse events to draw the path of the mouse on a . 一条直线段添加到每个和发生的事件。A line segment is added to the for each and events that occur. 要更新该图形为调用方法上每个`MouseDown`和`MouseUp`事件。To update the graphics, the method is called for the on each `MouseDown` and `MouseUp` event. 此外，向上或向下时滚动的图形路径事件发生。In addition, the graphic path is scrolled up or down when the event occurs. 其他鼠标事件，如，在屏幕上以及标识。Additional mouse events, like , are identified on screen as well. 在屏幕上还显示了从鼠标有关的其他信息类。Also displayed on the screen is additional information about the mouse from the class. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置控件的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the control.

value.span: 控件的名称。

span.span: The name of the control.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以用于在运行时评估对象由名称而不是类型和编程名称。The property can be used at run time to evaluate the object by name rather than type and programmatic name. 因为属性返回类型，可以用例样式逻辑语句中对它进行评估 (`Select`中的语句[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]，`switch`语句在 Visual C# 和[!INCLUDE[vcprvc](~/includes/vcprvc-md.md)])。Because the property returns a type, it can be evaluated in case-style logic statements (`Select` statement in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], `switch` statement in Visual C# and [!INCLUDE[vcprvc](~/includes/vcprvc-md.md)]). ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示中的控件的添加或删除从窗体控件时。The following code example displays the of a control in a when the control is added or removed from a form. MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnAutoSizeChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnAutoSizeChanged (e As EventArgs)

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是引发事件的方法时执行属性值更改。The following code example is an event-raising method that is executed when the property value changes. 类的一些方法的名称模式具有`On` *PropertyName* `Changed` ，引发相应*PropertyName* `Changed`事件时*PropertyName*值发生更改 (*PropertyName*表示对应的属性的名称)。The class has several methods with the name pattern `On`*PropertyName*`Changed` that raise the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event when the *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下面的代码示例更改的派生显示货币数据的类。The following code example changes the of a derived class displaying currency data. 该示例将文本转换为十进制数和更改到如果数字为负和如果数值为正。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 此示例要求你拥有派生自的类类。This example requires that you have a class that derives from the class. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/CPP/onpropertychangedevents.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/CS/onpropertychangedevents.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/VB/onpropertychangedevents.vb#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是引发事件的方法时执行属性值更改。The following code example is an event-raising method that is executed when the property value changes. 类的一些方法的名称模式具有`On` *PropertyName* `Changed` ，引发相应*PropertyName* `Changed`事件时*PropertyName*值发生更改 (*PropertyName*表示对应的属性的名称)。The class has several methods with the name pattern `On`*PropertyName*`Changed` that raise the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event when the *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下面的代码示例更改的派生显示货币数据的类。The following code example changes the of a derived class displaying currency data. 该示例将文本转换为十进制数和更改到如果数字为负和如果数值为正。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 此示例要求你拥有派生自的类类。This example requires that you have a class that derives from the class. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/CPP/onpropertychangedevents.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/CS/onpropertychangedevents.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/VB/onpropertychangedevents.vb#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 向控件通知 Windows 消息。

span.span: Notifies the control of Windows messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用如果控件的`EnableNotifyMessage`中设置样式位时。The method is called if the control's `EnableNotifyMessage` style bit is set in . `EnableNotifyMessage`设置中的样式使控件能够时获得通知方法接收 Windows 消息。The `EnableNotifyMessage` style in enables the control to be notified when the method receives a Windows message. 使用此方法，不完全受信任的控件可以但却不允许修改消息侦听的 Windows 消息。With this method, semi-trusted controls can listen for Windows messages without enabling them to modify the message.

para.span: 在重写派生类中调用基类的方法不必要，因为没有初始实现。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, calling the base class's method is not necessary because there is no initial implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用户能够将图像或图像文件拖动到窗体，并将其显示在其删除的点。The following code example enables the user to drag an image or image file onto the form, and have it be displayed at the point on which it is dropped. 方法被重写来重绘图像绘制窗体时每次; 否则该映像将只持续到下一步重新绘制。The method is overridden to repaint the image each time the form is painted; otherwise the image would only persist until the next repainting. 事件处理方法确定要拖动到窗体中数据的类型，并提供适当的反馈。The event-handling method determines the type of data being dragged into the form and provides the appropriate feedback. 事件处理方法在窗体上显示的图像，如果可以从数据创建。The event-handling method displays the image on the form, if an can be created from the data. 因为和值屏幕坐标，该示例使用方法来将它们转换成工作区坐标。Because the and values are screen coordinates, the example uses the method to convert them to client coordinates. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是引发事件的方法时执行属性值更改。The following code example is an event-raising method that is executed when the property value changes. 类的一些方法的名称模式具有`On` *PropertyName* `Changed` ，引发相应*PropertyName* `Changed`事件时*PropertyName*值发生更改 (*PropertyName*表示对应的属性的名称)。The class has several methods with the name pattern `On`*PropertyName*`Changed` that raise the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event when the *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下面的代码示例更改的派生显示货币数据的类。The following code example changes the of a derived class displaying currency data. 该示例将文本转换为十进制数和更改到如果数字为负和如果数值为正。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 此示例要求你拥有派生自的类类。This example requires that you have a class that derives from the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是引发事件的方法时执行属性值更改。The following code example is an event-raising method that is executed when the property value changes. 类的一些方法的名称模式具有`On` *PropertyName* `Changed` ，引发相应*PropertyName* `Changed`事件时*PropertyName*值发生更改 (*PropertyName*表示对应的属性的名称)。The class has several methods with the name pattern `On`*PropertyName*`Changed` that raise the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event when the *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下面的代码示例更改的派生显示货币数据的类。The following code example changes the of a derived class displaying currency data. 该示例将文本转换为十进制数和更改到如果数字为负和如果数值为正。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 此示例要求你拥有派生自的类类。This example requires that you have a class that derives from the class. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/CPP/onpropertychangedevents.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/CS/onpropertychangedevents.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/VB/onpropertychangedevents.vb#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 拖动开始后，此方法会重复调用[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]直到取消或完成拖动操作。After dragging has begun, this method is called repeatedly by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] until the drag operation is either canceled or completed. > [!NOTE] > 如果你想要更改在哪些拖动操作取消或放置操作发生的点，重写此方法。Override this method if you want to change the point at which dragging is canceled or at which a drop occurs. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: Gets or sets padding within the control.

value.span: 表示控件的内部间距特征的 。

span.span: A representing the control's internal spacing characteristics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关等容器和、属性获取或设置其各自属性。For containers such as and , the property gets or sets their respective properties. 属性等同于其属性。The property is equal to its property. 默认值时控件接收规范的合理即将 Windows 用户界面指南。Controls receive default values for that are reasonably close to Windows user interface guidelines. 一些调整可能仍有必要为特定应用程序。Some adjustments might still be necessary for particular applications. 实现的所有控件按数量在扩大时是`true`。All controls that implement are enlarged by the amount in when is `true`. 以下控件不使用:The following controls do not use : - 未实现的控件通过 Controls that do not implement through - 直接从继承的自定义控件 Custom controls that directly inherit from - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后将其命名实例`Control1`并确保与事件处理程序事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 时在重绘控件将引发事件。The event is raised when the control is redrawn. 它将的一个实例传递到处理的方法事件。It passes an instance of to the method(s) that handles the event. 在创建新的自定义控件或继承的控件时具有不同的可视外观，你必须提供代码以通过重写呈现控件方法。When creating a new custom control or an inherited control with a different visual appearance, you must provide code to render the control by overriding the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[重写 OnPaint 方法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/overriding-the-onpaint-method.md)和[自定义控件的绘制和呈现](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/custom-control-painting-and-rendering.md)。For more information, see [Overriding the OnPaint Method](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/overriding-the-onpaint-method.md) and [Custom Control Painting and Rendering](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/custom-control-painting-and-rendering.md). 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建控件在窗体和使用事件要绘制到它。The following code example creates a control on the form and uses the event to draw to it. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用户将图像或图像文件拖动到窗体，并将其显示在上的点被删除。The following code example enables the user to drag an image or image file onto the form, and have it be displayed at the point on it is dropped. 方法被重写来重绘图像绘制窗体时每次; 否则该映像将只持续到下一步重新绘制。The method is overridden to repaint the image each time the form is painted; otherwise the image would only persist until the next repainting. 事件处理方法确定要拖动到窗体中数据的类型，并提供适当的反馈。The event-handling method determines the type of data being dragged into the form and provides the appropriate feedback. 事件处理方法在窗体上显示的图像，如果可以从数据创建。The event-handling method displays the image on the form, if an can be created from the data. 因为和值屏幕坐标，该示例使用方法来将它们转换成工作区坐标。Because the and values are screen coordinates, the example uses the method to convert them to client coordinates. remarks.format: ## Remarks 由应用程序的消息循环，以预处理输入的消息之前对它们进行调用。 is called by the application's message loop to preprocess input messages before they are dispatched. 可能的值有`msg`参数是 WM_KEYDOWN、 WM_SYSKEYDOWN、 WM_CHAR 和 WM_SYSCHAR。Possible values for the `msg` parameter are WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_CHAR, and WM_SYSCHAR. 在重写，控件应返回`true`以指示它已处理完该消息。When overriding , a control should return `true` to indicate that it has processed the message. 不会处理由控件的结果的消息`base.PreProcessMessage`应返回。For messages that are not processed by the control, the result of `base.PreProcessMessage` should be returned. 控件通常将如替代更专用的方法之一， ， ， ，或而不是重写。Controls will typically override one of the more specialized methods such as , , , , or instead of overriding .
