MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PreviewKeyDown As PreviewKeyDownEventHandler

summary.span: 在焦点位于此控件上的情况下，当有按键动作时发生（在 事件之前发生）。

span.span: Occurs before the event when a key is pressed while focus is on this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常由某些控件忽略某些按键操作，例如选项卡、 返回、 ESC、 和箭头键，因为它们被视为不输入键击。Some key presses, such as the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and arrow keys, are typically ignored by some controls because they are not considered input key presses. 例如，默认情况下，控件将忽略箭头键。For example, by default, a control ignores the arrow keys. 通常按箭头键会导致焦点将移动到上一页或下一页控件。Pressing the arrow keys typically causes the focus to move to the previous or next control. 箭头键被视为导航键，然后按这些密钥通常不会引发事件。The arrow keys are considered navigation keys and pressing these keys typically do not raise the event for a . 但是，按箭头键会引发事件。However, pressing the arrow keys for a does raise the event. 通过处理事件和设置属性`true`，你可以将提升按箭头键时的事件。By handling the event for a and setting the property to `true`, you can raise the event when the arrow keys are pressed. 但是，如果处理箭头键，则焦点将无法再移到上一页或下一页控件。However, if you handle the arrow keys, the focus will no longer move to the previous or next control. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示包括。The following code example demonstrates a that includes a . 当具有焦点并按向上箭头或向下箭头键中，显示。When the has the focus and you press the UP ARROW or DOWN ARROW keys, the appears. 事件处理程序检测到按向上键或向下箭头键时，并设置属性`true`。The event handler detects when the UP ARROW or DOWN ARROW keys are pressed and sets the property to `true`. 这就提高了事件，以便可以显示。This raises the event so that you can display the . 你不应该将任何逻辑置于事件处理程序中，除了要设置属性。You should not put any logic in the event handler, other than to set the property. 相反，你应该将你的逻辑置于事件处理程序。Instead, you should put your logic in the event handler. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.control.previewkeydown/cs/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.control.previewkeydown/vb/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 处理命令键。

span.span: Processes a command key.

returns.span: 如果字符已由控件处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the character was processed by the control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在消息预处理以处理命令键过程中调用此方法。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle command keys. 命令键是始终优先于常规输入键的键。Command keys are keys that always take precedence over regular input keys. 命令键的示例包括快捷键和菜单快捷方式。Examples of command keys include accelerators and menu shortcuts. 该方法必须返回`true`以指示它已处理命令键，或`false`以指示该密钥不是命令键。The method must return `true` to indicate that it has processed the command key, or `false` to indicate that the key is not a command key. 仅当控件承载在 Windows 窗体应用程序或作为 ActiveX 控件，才能调用此方法。This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control. 方法首先确定控件是否有，如果是这样，启用和来处理命令键。The method first determines whether the control has a , and if so, enables the to process the command key. 如果命令键不是菜单快捷方式，且该控件有父级，该密钥将传递到父级的方法。If the command key is not a menu shortcut and the control has a parent, the key is passed to the parent's method. 净效果是密钥上的控件层次结构"传"该命令。The net effect is that command keys are "bubbled" up the control hierarchy. 除了用户按下的键，密钥数据还指示哪些，如果有的话，同时按下修改键作为键的同一时间。In addition to the key the user pressed, the key data also indicates which, if any, modifier keys were pressed at the same time as the key. 修改键包括 SHIFT、 CTRL 和 ALT 键。Modifier keys include the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在预处理以处理对话框字符，例如控件的助记键的消息过程中调用此方法。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog characters, such as control mnemonics. 仅当调用此方法方法指示控件未在处理字符。This method is called only if the method indicates that the control is not processing the character. 方法只需将字符发送到父级的方法或返回`false`如果控件具有没有父级。The method simply sends the character to the parent's method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent. 类重写此方法以执行实际处理对话框字符。The class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog characters. 仅当控件承载在 Windows 窗体应用程序或作为 ActiveX 控件，才能调用此方法。This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法以使控件有机会处理助记键字符。This method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character. 方法应确定控件是否处于处理助记键的状态，以及是否给定的字符是否表示助记键。The method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic. 如果通过因此，此方法应执行与助记键并返回关联的操作`true`。If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`. 如果不是，该方法应返回`false`。If not, the method should return `false`. 通常使用此方法的实现方法来确定给定的字符是否与助记键在控件的文本相匹配。Implementations of this method often use the method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text. 例如:For example: ```csharp if (CanSelect && IsMnemonic(charCode, MyControl.Text) { // Perform action associated with mnemonic. } ``` 这种默认实现方法只返回`false`以指示该控件具有没有助记键。This default implementation of the method simply returns `false` to indicate that the control has no mnemonic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的按钮类，并重写扩展方法以显示自定义行为。The following code example demonstrates an extension of the button class that overrides the method to exhibit custom behavior. 该示例还演示了利用和属性。The example also demonstrates the use of the and properties. 若要运行此示例，请粘贴窗体类，同一文件中后面的以下代码。To run this example paste the following code after a form class, in the same file. 添加一个按钮类型`MnemonicButton`到窗体。Add a button of type `MnemonicButton` to the form. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event QueryAccessibilityHelp As QueryAccessibilityHelpEventHandler

summary.span: 在 为辅助功能应用程序提供帮助时发生。

span.span: Occurs when is providing help to accessibility applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应使用类以使用户能够通过按 F1 键来调用你可访问的对象的帮助。You should use the class to enable users to invoke help on your accessible object by pressing the F1 key. 使用中的完整信息为您提供。Using the provides you with complete information in the . 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个具有辅助功能的图表控件，并使用和类来公开可访问的信息。The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 该控件绘制图例以及两条曲线。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`类，该类派生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，在使用方法以提供为图表控件的自定义可访问的信息。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因为图表图例不是实际-基于控制，但改为绘制图表控件中，通过它不提供任何内置的可访问信息。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information. 因此，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`类重写方法以返回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示将图例的每个部分的访问信息。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 当辅助功能的应用程序使用此控件时，该控件可以提供所需的可访问信息。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此代码片段演示如何处理事件。This code excerpt demonstrates handling the event. 请参阅完整的代码示例的类概述。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event QueryContinueDrag As QueryContinueDragEventHandler

summary.span: 在拖放操作期间发生，并且允许拖动源确定是否应取消拖放操作。

span.span: Occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 拖放操作期间键盘或鼠标按钮状态更改时引发事件。The event is raised when there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state during a drag-and-drop operation. 事件允许拖动源确定是否应取消拖放操作。The event enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled. 下面描述与拖放操作相关的事件的引发方式以及引发时间。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 方法确定当前光标位置下的控件。The method determines the control under the current cursor location. 然后检查以确定控件是否有效的放置目标。It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target. 如果控件是有效的放置目标，产生指定的拖放效果引发事件。If the control is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 有关拖放效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 跟踪鼠标光标位置、键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态的更改。Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果用户移出一个窗口，则引发 事件。If the user moves out of a window, the event is raised. - 如果鼠标进入另一个控件，则引发该控件的 。If the mouse enters another control, the for that control is raised. - 如果鼠标移动但停留在同一个控件中，则引发 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the event is raised. 如果键盘或鼠标按钮状态，更改事件引发，并确定是否继续拖动、 放置数据或取消该操作基于值属性的事件的。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the property of the event's . - 如果值是`Continue`、引发事件以继续操作和产生新效果引发事件，从而能够设置适当的视觉反馈。If the value of is `Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和事件成对发生，以便当鼠标移到放置目标时，用户提供的最新反馈有关鼠标位置。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position. - 如果值是`Drop`、 向源返回放置效果值，以便源应用程序可以执行适当的操作的源数据; 例如，如果会剪切数据是移动操作。If the value of is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. - 如果值是`Cancel`、引发事件。If the value of is `Cancel`, the event is raised. 默认情况下，事件集到`Cancel`中曾按下 ESC 键，并设置到`Drop`中如果按左、 中间，或向右鼠标按钮。By default, the event sets to `Cancel` in if the ESC key was pressed and sets to `Drop` in if the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示两个之间拖放操作控件。The following code example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 该示例通过调用方法的拖放操作启动时。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果鼠标已移动的拖放操作启动多个从期间的鼠标位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定要在将拖动的项的索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 该示例还演示如何使用自定义光标拖放操作。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例需要两个光标文件`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`、 存在于应用程序目录，用于自定义拖动和非放置光标，分别。The example requires that two cursor files,`3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果将使用自定义光标`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已选中。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自定义光标设置事件处理程序。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态评估中事件处理程序右侧`ListBox`，以确定将哪些拖动操作基于 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 和 CTRL + ALT 键的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based on state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期间还确定将发生放置`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是`String`，则设置为`None`中。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to `None` in . 最后，下拉的状态将显示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 要为权限放置的数据`ListBox`中确定事件处理程序和`String`值添加中的适当位置`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果在拖动操作超出边界的窗体中，则采用取消拖放操作事件处理程序。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此代码片段演示如何使用事件。This code excerpt demonstrates using the event. 请参阅完整的代码示例的方法。See the method for the complete code example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定的调整大小的控件，可以强制转换`sender`参数的已注册方法并获取其属性 (或和属性单独）。To determine the of the resized control, you can cast the `sender` parameter of the registered method to a and get its property (or and properties individually). 若要处理自定义布局，使用而不是调整大小事件的事件。To handle custom layouts, use the event instead of the Resize event. 在响应中引发事件事件，但还会在响应其他影响控件的布局更改。The event is raised in response to a event, but also in response to other changes that affect the layout of the control. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例处理事件。The following code example handles the event of a . 调整窗体的大小时，事件处理程序可确保该窗体停留正方形 (其和保持相等)。When the form is resized, the event handler ensures that the form stays square (its and remain equal). 若要运行此示例，请确保，并将此事件处理方法关联处理该窗体事件。To run this example, make sure and associate this event-handling method with the form’s event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法强制立即进行布局，如果有任何挂起的布局请求。Calling the method forces an immediate layout if there are any pending layout requests. 和方法相继配合使用以禁止显示多个事件时调整控件的多个属性。The and methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control. 例如，你通常应该调用方法，然后设置， ， ，或属性的控件，，然后调用方法，以使更改生效。For example, you would typically call the method, then set the , , , or properties of the control, and then call the method to enable the changes to take effect. 必须有没有挂起的调用到为成功调用。There must be no pending calls to for to be successfully called. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将两个按钮添加到窗体。The following code example adds two buttons to a form. 示例事务使用按钮添加和方法。The example transactions the addition of the buttons by using the and methods. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Members2#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Members2/CPP/controlmembers2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Members2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Members2/CS/controlmembers2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Members2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Members2/VB/controlmembers2.vb#2)]

span.span: Resumes usual layout logic, optionally forcing an immediate layout of pending layout requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法强制立即进行布局，如果有任何挂起的布局请求。Calling the method forces an immediate layout if there are any pending layout requests. 当`performLayout`参数设置为`true`，如果有任何挂起的布局请求，则会发生对立即进行布局。When the `performLayout` parameter is set to `true`, an immediate layout occurs if there are any pending layout requests. 和方法相继配合使用以禁止显示多个事件时调整控件的多个属性。The and methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control. 例如，你通常应该调用方法，然后设置， ， ，或属性的控件，，然后调用方法，以使更改生效。For example, you would typically call the method, then set the , , , or properties of the control, and then call the method to enable the changes to take effect. 必须有没有挂起的调用到为成功调用。There must be no pending calls to for to be successfully called. > [!NOTE] > 在多个控件添加到父控件时，建议您调用方法之前初始化要添加的控件。When adding several controls to a parent control, it is recommended that you call the method before initializing the controls to be added. 在将控件添加到父控件之后, 调用方法。After adding the controls to the parent control, call the method. 这将增加有许多控件的应用程序的性能。This will increase the performance of applications with many controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性等于的总和属性值和属性值。The value of the property is equal to the sum of the property value and the property value. 属性为只读。The property is read-only. 你可以通过更改的值间接更改此属性的值或属性或调用， ， ，或方法。You can change this property value indirectly by changing the value of the or properties or calling the , , , or methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建三个窗体上控件并通过使用各种大小相关以及与位置相关属性中设置其大小和位置。The following code example creates three controls on a form and sets their size and location by using the various size-related and location-related properties. 此示例要求你拥有，其宽度和高度至少 300 像素。This example requires that you have a that has a width and height of at least 300 pixels. span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether control's elements are aligned to support locales using right-to-left fonts.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是一个环境属性。The property is an ambient property. 环境属性是控件属性，如果未设置，从父控件检索。An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 例如，都不具有相同作为其父默认情况下。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 有关环境属性的详细信息，请参阅类或类概述。For more information about ambient properties, see the class or the class overview. 属性用于国际应用程序语言从右到左，例如希伯来语或阿拉伯语写入的位置。The property is used for international applications where the language is written from right to left, such as Hebrew or Arabic. 当此属性设置为，从右到左显示包含文本的控件元素。When this property is set to , control elements that include text are displayed from right to left. > [!NOTE] > 如果值在运行时更改属性，仅对不带格式的原始文本时保留。If the value of the property is changed at run time, only raw text without formatting is preserved. 以下是一些示例的控件元素如何受属性值:The following are a few examples of how control elements are affected by the property value of : - 垂直滚动条显示在左边而不是可滚动控件的右侧 (例如， ， 、 多行，和)。Vertical scroll bars are displayed on the left side rather than right side of scrollable controls (for example, , , multiline , and ). - 水平滚动条的初始滚动框 （缩略图） 右对齐。Horizontal scroll bars start with the scroll box (thumb) right-aligned. - 复选框元素对齐方式，由控制`CheckAlign`属性，将反转以进行和控件。The check box element alignment, controlled by the `CheckAlign` property, is reversed for and controls. - 右对齐列表框、 组合框和 up-down 控件中的项。Items in list box, combo box, and up-down controls are right aligned. - 向上和向下按钮为上的左对齐和控件。Up and down buttons are left-aligned on and controls. - 菜单 (， ，和) 右对齐显示。Menus (, , and ) are displayed right-aligned. - 上的工具栏按钮的对齐方式控件或上文本的对齐方式不受属性。The alignment of toolbar buttons on a control or the alignment of text on a is not affected by the property. - 支持从右到左对齐方式;但是，对 ActiveX 控件的影响取决于向其控件作者实现对从右到左显示支持的范围。 supports right-to-left alignment; however, the effect on an ActiveX control depends on the extent to which the control author implemented support for right-to-left display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将引发此事件通过以编程方式修改或用户交互更改属性。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个事件处理程序时执行属性值更改。The following code example is an event handler that is executed when the property value changes. 类的一些方法的名称模式具有*PropertyName* `Changed`都时引发相应*PropertyName*值发生更改 (*PropertyName*表示对应的属性的名称)。The class has several methods with the name pattern *PropertyName*`Changed` that are raised when the corresponding *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下面的代码示例更改的显示货币数据。The following code example changes the of a displaying currency data. 该示例将文本转换为十进制数和更改到如果数字为负和如果数值为正。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 此示例要求你拥有包含。This example requires that you have a that contains a . remarks.format: ## Remarks `directed`和`forward`参数由容器风格的控件。The `directed` and `forward` parameters are used by container-style controls. 当`directed`参数设置为`true`、`forward`参数进行计算以确定哪个控件进行选择。When the `directed` parameter is set to `true`, the `forward` parameter is evaluated to determine which control to select. 当`forward`设置为`true`，则在 tab 键顺序中的下一步控件被选定; 时`false`，选择上一个控件的 tab 键顺序。When `forward` is set to `true`, the next control in the tab order is selected; when `false`, the previous control in the tab order is selected. 方法激活的控件，如果控件的`Selectable`样式位设置为`true`中，该列包含在另一个控件中，并且所有其父控件是否可见且已启用。The method activates the control if the control's `Selectable` style bit is set to `true` in , it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled. 以下列表中的 Windows 窗体控件不是可选的。The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable. 从列表中的控件派生的控件将还不能选择。Controls derived from controls in the list will also not be selectable. - - - - - - - （当不存在控件中的链接） (when there is no link present in the control)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法激活的 tab 键顺序的下一个控件，如果控件的`Selectable`样式位设置为`true`中，该列包含在另一个控件中，并且所有其父控件是否可见且已启用。The method activates the next control in the tab order if the control's `Selectable` style bit is set to `true` in , it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled. 以下列表中的 Windows 窗体控件不是可选的。The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable. 从列表中的控件派生的控件将还不能选择。Controls derived from controls in the list will also not be selectable. - - - - - - - （当不存在控件中的链接） (when there is no link present in the control) 当你通过使用键盘 （选项卡上，按 SHIFT + TAB 等），通过调用更改焦点或方法，或通过设置到当前窗体的属性，将按以下顺序发生焦点事件：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果属性设置为`false`、和事件将被抑制。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. ## Examples 下面的代码 exampleshows具有某些控件的窗体中正在使用的方法。The following code exampleshows the method being used in a form that has some controls. 单击窗体中，每次激活下一个控件。Each time that you click the form, the next control is activated. 属性获取容器控件中当前处于活动状态的控件。The property gets the currently active control in the container control. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.control.selectnextcontrol/cs/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.control.selectnextcontrol/vb/form1.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示方法正在使用在窗体具有和一些其他控件。The following code example shows the method being used in a form that has a and some other controls. 当你单击之后, 的下一个控件激活。When you click the , the next control after the is activated. 注意到，您要获取其父类的控件。Notice that you have to get the parent of the control. 由于不是一个容器，调用直接基于可能不会更改激活。Since is not a container, calling directly on the would not change the activation. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.control.selectnextcontrol/cs/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.control.selectnextcontrol/vb/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将控件移到 z 顺序的后面。The control is moved to the back of the z-order. 如果控件是另一个控件的子级，移动子控件的 z 顺序的底层到。If the control is a child of another control, the child control is moved to the back of the z-order. 如果该控件为顶级控件，此方法将无法正常工作，除非该控件处于活动状态。If the control is a top-level control, this method will not work correctly unless the control is active. 顶级控件是一个控件，如，即不子级的另一个控件。A top-level control is a control, such as a , that is not a child of another control. 活动控件是具有输入焦点一个可见控件。An active control is a visible control that has input focus. 若要使用方法包含活动的顶级控件，首先调用在控件上的方法。To use the method with an inactive, top-level control, first call the method on the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为类是值类型 (`Structure`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]， `struct` Visual C# 中)，它返回的值，这意味着访问该属性返回的控件的大小副本。Because the class is a value type (`Structure` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], `struct` in Visual C#), it is returned by value, meaning accessing the property returns a copy of the size of the control. 因此，调整或属性返回此属性将不会影响或的控件。So, adjusting the or properties of the returned from this property will not affect the or of the control. 若要调整或的控件，你必须设置的控件的或属性或一组为一个新的属性。To adjust the or of the control, you must set the control's or property, or set the property with a new . > [!NOTE] > 若要维护更好的性能，不要设置处于其构造函数的控件。To maintain better performance, do not set the of a control in its constructor. 首选的方法是重写属性。The preferred method is to override the property. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows Server 2003 系统中的大小受到的最大像素宽度和高度的监视器。On Windows Server 2003 systems, the size of a is restricted by the maximum pixel width and height of the monitor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将添加到窗体并设置一些其通用的属性。The following code example adds a to a form and sets some of its common properties. 因此它会保留其相对位置，调整窗体的大小时，该示例将在窗体右下角该按钮定位。The example anchors the button to the bottom-right corner of the form so it keeps its relative position as the form is resized. 接下来，它将设置并调整其大小的按钮相同的大小为。Next it sets the and resizes the button to the same size as the . 然后，示例设置到`true`和设置属性。The example then sets the to `true` and sets the property. 最后，它将添加事件处理程序来处理该按钮的事件。Lastly, it adds an event handler to handle the event of the button. 此示例要求你拥有名为`imageList1`。This example requires that you have an named `imageList1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 最好使用事件来处理自定义布局。It is preferable to use the event to handle custom layouts. 在响应中引发事件事件，也可以在时布局可能需要应用其他条件。The event is raised in response to events, but also in other conditions when layout might need to be applied. 如果将引发此事件通过以编程方式修改或用户交互更改属性。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示事件。The following code example demonstrates the event. 实例控件已经被提供的可以水平和垂直方向同时扩展。An instance of a control has been provided that can be scaled both horizontally and vertically. A实例提供水平和垂直缩放值。A instance provides the horizontal and vertical scale value. 实例名为**确定**用于设置的缩放值控件实例。The instance named **OK** is used to set the scale values for the control instance. 每当控件的大小更改时，与关联的事件处理程序的控件的事件时调用。Whenever the size of the control changes, the event handler associated with the event of the control is called. 此事件处理程序会显示一个消息框中，该值指示控件的大小已更改。This event handler displays a message box indicating that the size of the control has changed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生时标志已添加或更改。The event occurs when flags have been added or changed. 如果在控件样式更改通过以编程方式修改或用户交互，引发此事件。This event is raised if the control style is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后将其命名实例`Control1`并确保与事件处理程序事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 临时挂起控件的布局逻辑。

span.span: Temporarily suspends the layout logic for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的布局逻辑被挂起，直到调用方法。The layout logic of the control is suspended until the method is called. 和方法相继配合使用以禁止显示多个事件时调整控件的多个属性。The and methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control. 例如，你通常应该调用方法，然后设置， ， ，或属性的控件，，然后调用方法，以使更改生效。For example, you would typically call the method, then set the , , , or properties of the control, and then call the method to enable the changes to take effect. 必须有没有挂起的调用到为成功调用。There must be no pending calls to for to be successfully called. > [!NOTE] > 在多个控件添加到父控件时，建议您调用方法之前初始化要添加的控件。When adding several controls to a parent control, it is recommended that you call the method before initializing the controls to be added. 在将控件添加到父控件之后, 调用方法。After adding the controls to the parent control, call the method. 这将增加有许多控件的应用程序的性能。This will increase the performance of applications with many controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将两个按钮添加到窗体。The following code example adds two buttons to a form. 示例事务使用按钮添加和方法。The example transactions the addition of the buttons by using the and methods. MemberSignature.Value: public: property int TabIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置控件在其容器内的 Tab 键顺序。

span.span: Gets or sets the tab order of the control within its container.

value.span: 控件容器中控件集合内的控件的索引值。

span.span: The index value of the control within the set of controls within its container.

value.span: 容器中包括的控件以 Tab 键顺序排列。

span.span: The controls in the container are included in the tab order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 选项卡索引可以包含的任何有效的整数大于或等于零，较低数字靠前的 tab 键顺序。A tab index can consist of any valid integer greater than or equal to zero, lower numbers being earlier in the tab order. 如果在同一个父控件上的多个控件具有相同的选项卡索引，控件的 z 顺序确定的顺序控件循环。If more than one control on the same parent control has the same tab index, the z-order of the controls determines the order to cycle through the controls. 控件的 tab 键顺序，包括其属性必须设置为`true`。For a control to be included in the tab order, its property must be set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将添加到窗体并设置一些其通用的属性。The following code example adds a to a form and sets some of its common properties. 因此它会保留其相对位置，调整窗体的大小时，该示例将在窗体右下角该按钮定位。The example anchors the button to the bottom-right corner of the form so it keeps its relative position as the form is resized. 接下来，它将设置并调整其大小的按钮相同的大小为。Next it sets the and resizes the button to the same size as the . 然后，示例设置到`true`和设置属性。The example then sets the to `true` and sets the property. 最后，它将添加事件处理程序来处理该按钮的事件。Lastly, it adds an event handler to handle the event of the button. 此示例要求你拥有名为`imageList1`。This example requires that you have an named `imageList1`. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户能否使用 Tab 键将焦点放到该控件上。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can give the focus to this control using the TAB key.

value.span: 如果用户可以用 Tab 键将焦点放到此控件上，则为 ；反之，则为 。

span.span: if the user can give the focus to the control using the TAB key; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户按 TAB 键时，则会将输入的焦点设置为下一个控件的 tab 键顺序。When the user presses the TAB key, the input focus is set to the next control in the tab order. 控制与属性值`false`不包括在 tab 键顺序中的控件集合。Controls with the property value of `false` are not included in the collection of controls in the tab order. 通过设置控件的可操作的 tab 键顺序属性值。The tab order can be manipulated by setting the control's property value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将添加到窗体并设置一些其通用的属性。The following code example adds a to a form and sets some of its common properties. 因此它会保留其相对位置，调整窗体的大小时，该示例将在窗体右下角该按钮定位。The example anchors the button to the bottom-right corner of the form so it keeps its relative position as the form is resized. 接下来，它将设置并调整其大小的按钮相同的大小为。Next it sets the and resizes the button to the same size as the . 然后，示例设置到`true`和设置属性。The example then sets the to `true` and sets the property. 最后，它将添加事件处理程序来处理该按钮的事件。Lastly, it adds an event handler to handle the event of the button. 此示例要求你拥有名为`imageList1`。This example requires that you have an named `imageList1`. summary.span: 获取或设置包含有关控件的数据的对象。

span.span: Gets or sets the object that contains data about the control.

value.span: 一个 ，其中包含有关控件的数据。

span.span: An that contains data about the control.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从派生的任何类型类可以分配给此属性。Any type derived from the class can be assigned to this property. 如果通过 Windows 窗体设计器设置属性，可分配纯文本。If the property is set through the Windows Forms designer, only text can be assigned. 一个常见用途属性是用于存储与控件密切相关联的数据。A common use for the property is to store data that is closely associated with the control. 例如，如果你有一个控件，显示有关客户的信息，你可能会存储，其中包含该控件中的客户的订单历史记录属性，以便可以快速访问这些数据。For example, if you have a control that displays information about a customer, you might store a that contains the customer's order history in that control's property so the data can be accessed quickly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个窗体，并将存储`Customer`中其属性。The following code example displays a form and stores a `Customer` in its property. 此示例需要您已经定义了派生自的类名为`CustomerForm`和已定义`Customer`。This example requires that you have defined a class that derives from named `CustomerForm` and that you have defined a `Customer`. span.span: Gets or sets the text associated with this control.

value.span: 与该控件关联的文本。

span.span: The text associated with this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的每个派生类以不同方式使用的控件属性。The property of the control is used differently by each derived class. 例如属性显示在窗体顶部的标题栏中，在字符计数中，很小，通常会显示的应用程序或文档的名称。For example the property of a is displayed in the title bar at the top of the form, is fairly small in character count, and usually displays the application or document name. 但是，属性可以很大，并且可以包含多个非可视字符用于设置文本格式。However, the property of a can be large and can include numerous nonvisual characters used to format the text. 例如，在显示的文本可通过调整格式设置属性，或通过添加空格或制表符对齐文本。For example, the text displayed in a can be formatted by adjusting the properties, or by the addition of spaces or tab characters to align the text. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并设置一些其通用的属性。The following code example creates a and sets some of its common properties. 该示例创建并设置其组框中。The example creates a and sets its within the group box. 接下来，它将设置属性组框中，并停靠组框中的，到窗体顶部。Next, it sets the property of the group box, and docks the group box to the top of the form. 最后，通过设置禁用分组框属性`false`，这将导致产生包含在要禁用的组框内的所有控件。Lastly, it disables the group box by setting the property to `false`, which causes all controls contained within the group box to be disabled. remarks.format: ## Remarks 顶级控件被指不是另一个 Windows 窗体控件的父控件。The top-level control is defined as the parent control that is not parented by another Windows Forms control. 通常，这是控件所在的最外面的 。Typically, this is the outermost that the control is contained in. 例如，如果该控件包含 MDI 子窗体上，顶级控件为多文档界面 (MDI) 父。For example, if the control is contained on an MDI child , then the top-level control is the Multiple Document Interface (MDI) parent . 如果该控件没有父级上，此属性将返回`null`。If the control is not parented on a , this property will return `null`.

summary.span: 使控件重绘其工作区内的无效区域。

span.span: Causes the control to redraw the invalidated regions within its client area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 执行绘制任何挂起的请求。Executes any pending requests for painting. 有两种方法来重绘窗体及其内容：There are two ways to repaint a form and its contents: - 你可以使用的重载之一方法替换方法。You can use one of the overloads of the method with the method. - 你可以调用方法，这会强制控件重绘本身及其所有子级。You can call the method, which forces the control to redraw itself and all its children. 这相当于设置方法`true`并使用它与。This is equivalent to setting the method to `true` and using it with . 方法控制什么获取绘制或重新绘制。The method governs what gets painted or repainted. 方法控制何时进行绘制或重绘。The method governs when the painting or repainting occurs. 如果你使用和方法一起使用，而不是调用，绘制的内容取决于哪个重载的你使用。If you use the and methods together rather than calling , what gets repainted depends on which overload of you use. 方法只需强制立即，绘制控件但方法控制所绘制在调用时方法。The method just forces the control to be painted immediately, but the method governs what gets painted when you call the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[WM_PAINT](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd145213\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主题。For more information, see the[WM_PAINT](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd145213\(v=vs.85\).aspx)topic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每当执行需要耗费大量时间操作时，请使用等待光标。但是，请注意，阻塞 UI 线程的操作还将阻止 acursor 更改。因此，仅当在另一个线程中执行耗时的操作时，才应使用此属性。Use a wait cursor whenever you perform an operation that takes a noticeable amount of time.However, note that operations that block the UI thread will also block acursor change.Therefore, this property should only be used when performing time-consuming operations in another thread. 若要在全局级别并立即更改光标，请参阅属性。To change the cursor globally and immediately, seethe property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你通过使用键盘 （选项卡上，按 SHIFT + TAB 等），通过调用更改焦点或方法，或通过设置到当前窗体的属性，将按以下顺序发生焦点事件：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 当你通过使用鼠标或通过调用更改焦点方法，焦点事件按下列顺序发生：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果属性设置为`false`、和事件将被抑制。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. 如果属性设置为`true`中事件委托中，通常会发生后的所有事件事件将被抑制。If the property of the is set to `true` in the event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the event are suppressed. > [!CAUTION] > 请不要尝试将焦点设置在， ， ， ， ，或事件处理程序。Do not attempt to set focus from within the , , , , , or event handlers. 这样做会导致你的应用程序或操作系统停止响应。Doing so can cause your application or the operating system to stop responding. 有关详细信息，请参阅[WM_KILLFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms632614\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主题和的"消息死锁"部分[关于消息和消息队列](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms644927\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主题。For more information, see the[WM_KILLFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms632614\(v=vs.85\).aspx)topic, and the "Message Deadlocks" section of the [About Messages and Message Queues](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms644927\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topic. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类并验证用户输入的电子邮件地址。The following code example uses the derived class and validates an email address that the user enters. 如果电子邮件地址不是标准的格式 (包含"@" and "。")，则验证将失败，图标会显示，并且取消了该事件。If the email address is not in the standard format (containing "@" and "."), the validation fails, an icon is displayed, and the event is canceled. 此示例需要和已在窗体上创建控件。This example requires that a and control have been created on a form. span.span: The Windows to process.

summary.span: 处理 Windows 消息。

span.span: Processes Windows messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有消息都发送到方法通过进行筛选后的方法。All messages are sent to the method after getting filtered through the method. 方法与 Windows `WindowProc` 函数完全对应。The method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function. 有关处理 Windows 消息的详细信息，请参阅[WindowProc 函数](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=181565)。For more information about processing Windows messages, see the [WindowProc function](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=181565). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法以处理操作系统消息中标识结构。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method to handle operating system messages identified in the structure. [WM_ACTIVATEAPP](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms632614\(v=vs.85\).aspx)操作系统消息处理在此示例中要知道当另一个应用程序变为活动状态。The[WM_ACTIVATEAPP](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms632614\(v=vs.85\).aspx)operating system message is handled in this example to know when another application is becoming active. 请参阅以下主题以了解可用， ，和值。See the following topics to understand the available , , and values. 在 Windows.h 标头文件中找不到实际的常量值。Actual constant values can be found in the Windows.h header file. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/VB/form1.vb#1)]

para.span: 继承控件应调用基类的方法来处理它们不处理任何消息。

span.span: Inheriting controls should call the base class's method to process any messages that they do not handle.
